/**
 * Add event listeners to form elements to update the preview in real-time
 */
function addFormUpdateListeners() {
    // Get form elements
    const firstName = document.getElementById('firstName');
    const lastName = document.getElementById('lastName');
    const position = document.getElementById('position');
    const email = document.getElementById('email');
    const phone = document.getElementById('phone');
    const address = document.getElementById('address');
    const summary = document.getElementById('summary');
    const photoPreview = document.getElementById('profilePhotoPreview');

    // Create a function that updates the preview
    const updatePreview = () => {
        // Update name
        const previewName = document.querySelector('.preview-name');
        if (previewName && firstName && lastName) {
            const fullName = `${firstName.value || ''} ${lastName.value || ''}`.trim();
            previewName.textContent = fullName || 'Votre Nom';
        }

        // Update job title
        const previewTitle = document.querySelector('.preview-title');
        if (previewTitle && position) {
            previewTitle.textContent = position.value || 'Titre Professionnel';
        }

        // Update email
        updatePreviewContact('envelope', email ? email.value : null, 'email@exemple.com');

        // Update phone
        updatePreviewContact('phone', phone ? phone.value : null, '+123 456 7890');

        // Update address
        updatePreviewContact('map-marker-alt', address ? address.value : null, 'Votre adresse');

        // Update summary
        const previewSummary = document.querySelector('.preview-summary');
        if (previewSummary && summary) {
            previewSummary.textContent = summary.value || 'R√©sum√© professionnel...';
        }

        // Update profile photo
        const previewPhoto = document.querySelector('.preview-photo');
        if (previewPhoto && photoPreview) {
            previewPhoto.style.backgroundImage = `url('${photoPreview.src}')`;
            previewPhoto.style.backgroundSize = 'cover';
            previewPhoto.style.backgroundPosition = 'center';
            previewPhoto.style.borderRadius = '50%';
            previewPhoto.style.width = '120px';
            previewPhoto.style.height = '120px';
            previewPhoto.style.margin = '0 auto 1rem';
        }

        // Update progress percentage
        updateProgress();
    };

    // Helper function to update contact info in preview
    function updatePreviewContact(iconName, value, placeholder) {
        const selector = `.preview-section p i.fa-${iconName}`;
        const contactIcon = document.querySelector(selector);

        if (contactIcon) {
            const contactElement = contactIcon.parentElement;
            contactElement.innerHTML = `<i class="fas fa-${iconName}"></i> ${value || placeholder}`;
        }
    }

    // Add input event listeners to form elements
    const formElements = [firstName, lastName, position, email, phone, address, summary];
    formElements.forEach(element => {
        if (element) {
            element.addEventListener('input', updatePreview);
        }
    });

    // Special case for photo
    if (photoPreview) {
        const photoInput = document.getElementById('photoUpload');
        if (photoInput) {
            photoInput.addEventListener('change', updatePreview);
        }
    }

    // Initialize the preview with current values
    updatePreview();
}

/**
 * Update the progress percentage based on filled form fields
 */
function updateProgress() {
    // Get all required inputs and textareas
    const requiredFields = document.querySelectorAll('input[required], textarea[required]');
    const totalRequired = requiredFields.length;
    let filledRequired = 0;

    // Count filled required fields
    requiredFields.forEach(field => {
        if (field.value.trim() !== '') {
            filledRequired++;
        }
    });

    // Calculate percentage
    const percentage = Math.round((filledRequired / totalRequired) * 100);

    // Update progress bar and text
    const progressBar = document.querySelector('.progress-bar');
    const progressText = document.getElementById('progress-percent');

    if (progressBar && progressText) {
        progressBar.style.width = `${percentage}%`;
        progressBar.setAttribute('aria-valuenow', percentage);
        progressText.textContent = percentage;
    }
}

/**
 * Initialize tips carousel
 */
function initTipsCarousel() {
    const tips = document.querySelectorAll('.tips-carousel .tip');
    const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.tips-navigation .tip-dot');
    let currentTip = 0;
    const totalTips = tips.length;

    if (totalTips === 0) return;

    // Function to show a specific tip
    function showTip(index) {
        // Hide all tips
        tips.forEach(tip => tip.classList.remove('active'));

        // Deactivate all dots
        dots.forEach(dot => dot.classList.remove('active'));

        // Show selected tip and activate corresponding dot
        tips[index].classList.add('active');
        dots[index].classList.add('active');

        currentTip = index;
    }

    // Add click events to dots
    dots.forEach((dot, index) => {
        dot.addEventListener('click', () => {
            showTip(index);

            // Reset the automatic rotation timer
            clearInterval(tipInterval);
            tipInterval = setInterval(nextTip, 7000);
        });
    });

    // Function to show next tip
    function nextTip() {
        const nextIndex = (currentTip + 1) % totalTips;
        showTip(nextIndex);
    }

    // Set up automatic rotation
    let tipInterval = setInterval(nextTip, 7000);

    // Pause rotation when hovering over tips
    const tipsContainer = document.querySelector('.tips-carousel');
    if (tipsContainer) {
        tipsContainer.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
            clearInterval(tipInterval);
        });

        tipsContainer.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
            tipInterval = setInterval(nextTip, 7000);
        });
    }
}

/**
 * Initialize AI assistant toggle
 */
function initAIToggle() {
    const aiToggle = document.getElementById('aiAssistToggle');
    const aiSuggestions = document.querySelectorAll('.ai-suggestion');

    if (aiToggle && aiSuggestions.length > 0) {
        // Function to toggle AI suggestions visibility
        const toggleAISuggestions = () => {
            const isEnabled = aiToggle.checked;

            aiSuggestions.forEach(suggestion => {
                if (isEnabled) {
                    suggestion.style.display = 'block';
                } else {
                    suggestion.style.display = 'none';
                }
            });
        };
// Initialize visibility state
        // Initialize visibility state
        toggleAISuggestions();

// Add change event listener
        aiToggle.addEventListener('change', toggleAISuggestions);

// Add click event for generate summary button
        const generateSummaryBtn = document.querySelector('.generate-summary-btn');
        if (generateSummaryBtn) {
            generateSummaryBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const position = document.getElementById('position').value;
                const firstName = document.getElementById('firstName').value;
                const lastName = document.getElementById('lastName').value;

                if (!position) {
                    showNotification('Veuillez d\'abord saisir votre titre professionnel', 'warning');
                    return;
                }

                // Show loading state
                this.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> G√©n√©ration...';
                this.disabled = true;

                // Simulate AI generation (would connect to an actual API in production)
                setTimeout(() => {
                    const summaryElement = document.getElementById('summary');

                    // Generate summary based on position
                    let generatedSummary = '';
                    const fullName = `${firstName} ${lastName}`.trim();
                    const namePrefix = fullName ? `${fullName}, ` : '';

                    if (position.toLowerCase().includes('d√©veloppeur') || position.toLowerCase().includes('developer')) {
                        generatedSummary = `${namePrefix}d√©veloppeur passionn√© avec une solide expertise technique et un engagement pour la qualit√© du code. Sp√©cialis√© dans la conception et le d√©veloppement d'applications modernes et √©volutives. Capacit√© √† travailler efficacement en √©quipe et √† r√©soudre des probl√®mes complexes.`;
                    } else if (position.toLowerCase().includes('ing√©nieur') || position.toLowerCase().includes('engineer')) {
                        generatedSummary = `${namePrefix}ing√©nieur exp√©riment√© combinant connaissances techniques approfondies et approche m√©thodique pour r√©soudre des probl√®mes complexes. Fort d'une solide formation et d'une exp√©rience pratique, je m'adapte rapidement aux nouvelles technologies et m√©thodologies.`;
                    } else if (position.toLowerCase().includes('project') || position.toLowerCase().includes('projet')) {
                        generatedSummary = `${namePrefix}chef de projet exp√©riment√© avec un historique av√©r√© de livraisons r√©ussies dans les d√©lais et le budget impartis. Comp√©tences solides en planification, coordination d'√©quipe et gestion des parties prenantes. Capable d'aligner les objectifs techniques avec les besoins business.`;
                    } else {
                        generatedSummary = `${namePrefix}professionnel dynamique avec une expertise en ${position}. Orient√© r√©sultats et dot√© d'excellentes comp√©tences analytiques et de communication. Capacit√© √©prouv√©e √† travailler efficacement en √©quipe et √† s'adapter √† des environnements changeants.`;
                    }

                    // Update the summary field
                    if (summaryElement) {
                        summaryElement.value = generatedSummary;
                        summaryElement.dispatchEvent(new Event('input')); // Trigger input event
                    }

                    // Reset button
                    this.innerHTML = 'G√©n√©rer un r√©sum√©';
                    this.disabled = false;

                    showNotification('R√©sum√© g√©n√©r√© avec succ√®s !', 'success');
                }, 1500);
            });
        }

        // Add click event for suggesting skills button
        const suggestSkillsBtn = document.querySelector('.suggest-skills-btn');
        if (suggestSkillsBtn) {
            suggestSkillsBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const position = document.getElementById('position').value;

                if (!position) {
                    showNotification('Veuillez d\'abord saisir votre titre professionnel', 'warning');
                    return;
                }

                // Show loading state
                this.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> G√©n√©ration...';
                this.disabled = true;

                // Simulate AI generation (would connect to an actual API in production)
                setTimeout(() => {
                    // Generate skills based on position
                    let suggestedSkills = [];

                    if (position.toLowerCase().includes('d√©veloppeur') || position.toLowerCase().includes('developer')) {
                        suggestedSkills = ['JavaScript', 'TypeScript', 'React', 'Node.js', 'Git', 'API REST', 'SQL', 'MongoDB'];
                    } else if (position.toLowerCase().includes('data') || position.toLowerCase().includes('donn√©es')) {
                        suggestedSkills = ['Python', 'SQL', 'Machine Learning', 'Pandas', 'Tableau', 'Power BI', 'Data Mining', 'Statistiques'];
                    } else if (position.toLowerCase().includes('marketing')) {
                        suggestedSkills = ['SEO/SEA', 'Google Analytics', 'R√©seaux sociaux', 'Content Marketing', 'Email Marketing', 'CRM', 'Adobe Creative Suite'];
                    } else if (position.toLowerCase().includes('project') || position.toLowerCase().includes('projet')) {
                        suggestedSkills = ['Gestion de projet', 'M√©thodologies Agiles', 'Scrum', 'MS Project', 'Budg√©tisation', 'Gestion des risques', 'Leadership'];
                    } else {
                        suggestedSkills = ['Communication', 'Travail d\'√©quipe', 'R√©solution de probl√®mes', 'Organisation', 'Adaptabilit√©', 'Microsoft Office'];
                    }

                    // Add skills
                    const skillInput = document.getElementById('skillInput');
                    const addSkillBtn = document.getElementById('addSkillBtn');

                    if (skillInput && addSkillBtn) {
                        suggestedSkills.forEach(skill => {
                            skillInput.value = skill;
                            addSkillBtn.click();
                        });
                    }

                    // Reset button
                    this.innerHTML = 'Sugg√©rer des comp√©tences';
                    this.disabled = false;

                    showNotification('Comp√©tences sugg√©r√©es ajout√©es !', 'success');
                }, 1500);
            });
        }

        // Add click event for verb examples button
        const verbExamplesBtn = document.querySelector('.verb-examples-btn');
        if (verbExamplesBtn) {
            verbExamplesBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // This will be handled by Bootstrap's modal
                const verbModal = new bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById('verbExamplesModal'));
                verbModal.show();
            });
        }
    }
}

/**
 * Initialize template change functionality
 */
function initTemplateChange() {
    const changeTemplateBtn = document.getElementById('changeTemplateBtn');
    const changeTemplateModal = document.getElementById('changeTemplateModal');
    const confirmTemplateChangeBtn = document.getElementById('confirmTemplateChangeBtn');
    const templateItems = document.querySelectorAll('.template-item');

    let selectedNewTemplate = null;

    if (changeTemplateBtn && changeTemplateModal && templateItems.length > 0) {
        // Show modal when button is clicked
        changeTemplateBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            const modal = new bootstrap.Modal(changeTemplateModal);
            modal.show();
        });

        // Handle template selection
        templateItems.forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // Remove selected class from all items
                templateItems.forEach(i => i.classList.remove('selected'));

                // Add selected class to clicked item
                this.classList.add('selected');

                // Store selected template
                selectedNewTemplate = this.getAttribute('data-template');
            });
        });

        // Handle confirm button
        if (confirmTemplateChangeBtn) {
            confirmTemplateChangeBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (selectedNewTemplate) {
                    // Update template input
                    const templateInput = document.getElementById('selectedTemplate');
                    if (templateInput) {
                        templateInput.value = selectedNewTemplate;
                    }

                    // Update localStorage
                    localStorage.setItem('selectedTemplate', selectedNewTemplate);

                    // Update UI
                    updateSelectedTemplateUI(selectedNewTemplate);

                    // Update preview
                    updatePreviewForTemplate(selectedNewTemplate);

                    // Close modal (Bootstrap 5)
                    const modal = bootstrap.Modal.getInstance(changeTemplateModal);
                    if (modal) {
                        modal.hide();
                    }

                    showNotification('Template modifi√© avec succ√®s !', 'success');
                } else {
                    showNotification('Veuillez s√©lectionner un template', 'warning');
                }
            });
        }
    }
}

/**
 * Initialize action verb modal
 */
function initActionVerbModal() {
    // This is handled by Bootstrap's modal system
}

/**
 * Initialize feedback modal and rating system
 */
function initFeedbackModal() {
    const ratingStars = document.querySelectorAll('.rating .fa-star');

    if (ratingStars.length > 0) {
        // Add hover effect and click events to stars
        ratingStars.forEach(star => {
            // Hover effect
            star.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
                const rating = parseInt(this.getAttribute('data-rating'));

                ratingStars.forEach(s => {
                    const starRating = parseInt(s.getAttribute('data-rating'));
                    if (starRating <= rating) {
                        s.classList.remove('far');
                        s.classList.add('fas');
                    } else {
                        s.classList.remove('fas');
                        s.classList.add('far');
                    }
                });
            });

            // Click event to select rating
            star.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const rating = parseInt(this.getAttribute('data-rating'));

                // Send rating (in a real app, this would send to a server)
                console.log(`User rated experience: ${rating}/5`);

                showNotification(`Merci pour votre note de ${rating}/5 !`, 'success');
            });
        });

        // Reset stars when mouse leaves rating container
        const ratingContainer = document.querySelector('.rating');
        if (ratingContainer) {
            ratingContainer.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
                // Check for already selected rating
                const selected = document.querySelector('.rating .fas');
                if (!selected) {
                    ratingStars.forEach(s => {
                        s.classList.remove('fas');
                        s.classList.add('far');
                    });
                }
            });
        }
    }
}

/**
 * Initialize CV generation
 */
function initCVGeneration() {
    const generateCVBtn = document.getElementById('generateCVBtn');

    if (generateCVBtn) {
        generateCVBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            const form = document.getElementById('cvForm');

            if (form) {
                // Check form validity
                if (!form.checkValidity()) {
                    // Trigger built-in validation
                    form.reportValidity();
                    return;
                }

                // Show loading state
                generateCVBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> G√©n√©ration...';
                generateCVBtn.disabled = true;

                // Simulate form submission (would actually submit in production)
                setTimeout(() => {
                    // Show success notification
                    document.getElementById('successNotification').classList.add('show');

                    // Show feedback modal
                    const feedbackModal = new bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById('feedbackModal'));
                    feedbackModal.show();

                    // Reset button
                    generateCVBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-file-download me-2"></i>G√©n√©rer mon CV';
                    generateCVBtn.disabled = false;

                    // Hide success notification after a delay
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        document.getElementById('successNotification').classList.remove('show');
                    }, 3000);
                }, 2000);
            }
        });
    }

    // Print preview button
    const printPreviewBtn = document.getElementById('printPreviewBtn');
    if (printPreviewBtn) {
        printPreviewBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            const previewContent = document.getElementById('previewContent').outerHTML;

            // Create a new window for printing
            const printWindow = window.open('', '_blank', 'height=600,width=800');
            printWindow.document.write(`
                <html>
                <head>
                    <title>CV Preview - Print</title>
                    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
                    <style>
                        body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; padding: 20px; }
                        ${document.querySelector('style').innerHTML}
                    </style>
                </head>
                <body>
                    <div style="max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto;">
                        ${previewContent}
                    </div>
                </body>
                </html>
            `);
            printWindow.document.close();

            // Print after a small delay to ensure styles are loaded
            setTimeout(() => {
                printWindow.print();
                printWindow.close();
            }, 500);
        });
    }

    // Download PDF button
    const downloadPDFBtn = document.getElementById('downloadPDFBtn');
    if (downloadPDFBtn) {
        downloadPDFBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            // In a real app, this would trigger a PDF generation and download
            // Here we'll just simulate the action

            // Show loading state
            downloadPDFBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin"></i> Pr√©paration...';
            downloadPDFBtn.disabled = true;

            setTimeout(() => {
                // Simulate PDF download
                showNotification('T√©l√©chargement du PDF d√©marr√© !', 'success');

                // Reset button
                downloadPDFBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-file-pdf me-2"></i>T√©l√©charger PDF';
                downloadPDFBtn.disabled = false;
            }, 1500);
        });
    }
}

/**
 * Show notification message
 * @param {string} message - The message to display
 * @param {string} type - The type of notification (success, warning, error, info)
 */
function showNotification(message, type = 'success') {
    // Create notification element if it doesn't exist
    let notification = document.querySelector('.notification-toast');

    if (!notification) {
        notification = document.createElement('div');
        notification.className = 'notification-toast';
        document.body.appendChild(notification);
    }

    // Set notification content and type
    notification.innerHTML = `
        <div class="notification-icon">
            <i class="fas fa-${type === 'success' ? 'check-circle' : type === 'warning' ? 'exclamation-triangle' : type === 'error' ? 'exclamation-circle' : 'info-circle'}"></i>
        </div>
        <div class="notification-content">${message}</div>
    `;
    notification.className = `notification-toast ${type}`;

    // Show notification
    notification.classList.add('show');

    // Hide after 3 seconds
    setTimeout(() => {
        notification.classList.remove('show');
    }, 3000);
}

// Function to initialize stepper
function initStepper() {
    const stepperContainer = document.getElementById('cv-stepper-container');

    // Define steps
    const steps = [
        { id: 1, label: 'Informations' },
        { id: 2, label: 'Formation' },
        { id: 3, label: 'Exp√©rience' },
        { id: 4, label: 'Comp√©tences' }
    ];

    // Create stepper HTML
    let stepperHTML = '<div class="cv-stepper">';

    steps.forEach((step, index) => {
        // Add step
        stepperHTML += `
            <div class="stepper-step ${step.id === 1 ? 'active' : ''}" data-step="${step.id}">
                <div class="step-number">${step.id}</div>
                <div class="step-label">${step.label}</div>
            </div>
        `;

        // Add connector (except after last item)
        if (index < steps.length - 1) {
            stepperHTML += '<div class="step-connector"></div>';
        }
    });

    stepperHTML += '</div>';
    stepperContainer.innerHTML = stepperHTML;
}

// Function to initialize form navigation
function initFormNavigation() {
    // Next section buttons
    const nextButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.next-section');
    nextButtons.forEach(button => {
        button.addEventListener('click', function() {
            const nextSectionId = this.getAttribute('data-next');
            if (nextSectionId) {
                navigateToSection(nextSectionId);
            }
        });
    });

    // Previous section buttons
    const prevButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.prev-section');
    prevButtons.forEach(button => {
        button.addEventListener('click', function() {
            const prevSectionId = this.getAttribute('data-prev');
            if (prevSectionId) {
                navigateToSection(prevSectionId);
            }
        });
    });
}

// Function to navigate to a specific form section
function navigateToSection(sectionId) {
    // Hide all sections
    const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.form-section-page');
    sections.forEach(section => {
        section.classList.remove('active');
    });

    // Show target section
    const targetSection = document.getElementById(`section-${sectionId}`);
    if (targetSection) {
        targetSection.classList.add('active');
    }

    // Update stepper
    updateStepperState(parseInt(sectionId));

    // Scroll to top of form
    const formTop = document.querySelector('.form-sections').offsetTop;
    window.scrollTo({ top: formTop - 100, behavior: 'smooth' });
}

// Function to update stepper state
function updateStepperState(currentStep) {
    const stepperSteps = document.querySelectorAll('.stepper-step');

    stepperSteps.forEach(step => {
        const stepNumber = parseInt(step.getAttribute('data-step'));

        // Remove all states
        step.classList.remove('active', 'completed');

        // Add appropriate state
        if (stepNumber === currentStep) {
            step.classList.add('active');
        } else if (stepNumber < currentStep) {
            step.classList.add('completed');
        }
    });

    // Update progress bar
    updateProgress();
}

// Function to initialize profile photo upload
function initProfilePhotoUpload() {
    const photoWrapper = document.querySelector('.profile-photo-wrapper');
    const photoInput = document.getElementById('photoUpload');
    const photoPreview = document.getElementById('profilePhotoPreview');

    if (photoWrapper && photoInput && photoPreview) {
        photoWrapper.addEventListener('click', function() {
            photoInput.click();
        });

        photoInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
            if (this.files && this.files[0]) {
                const reader = new FileReader();

                reader.onload = function(e) {
                    photoPreview.src = e.target.result;
                };

                reader.readAsDataURL(this.files[0]);

                // Add highlight effect
                photoWrapper.parentElement.classList.add('highlight');
                setTimeout(() => {
                    photoWrapper.parentElement.classList.remove('highlight');
                }, 800);
            }
        });
    }
}

// Function to initialize education section
function initEducationSection() {
    // Initialize Add First Education button
    const addFirstEducationBtn = document.getElementById('addFirstEducation');
    if (addFirstEducationBtn) {
        addFirstEducationBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            addEducationEntry();
            document.getElementById('educationEmptyState').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('addMoreEducationBtnContainer').style.display = 'block';
        });
    }

    // Initialize Add Another Education button
    const addEducationBtn = document.getElementById('addEducation');
    if (addEducationBtn) {
        addEducationBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            addEducationEntry();
        });
    }
}

// Function to add a new education entry
function addEducationEntry(data = {}) {
    const educationEntries = document.getElementById('educationEntries');
    const entryId = 'education-' + new Date().getTime();

    const entryHTML = `
        <div class="card shadow-sm mb-3 fade-in education-entry" id="${entryId}">
            <div class="card-header d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Formation</h5>
                <div class="card-actions">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger remove-entry" title="Supprimer">
                        <i class="fas fa-trash-alt"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary ms-1 drag-handle" title="R√©organiser">
                        <i class="fas fa-arrows-alt"></i>
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-3">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" id="${entryId}-school" name="education[school][]" placeholder="√âcole/Universit√©" value="${data.school || ''}" required>
                            <label for="${entryId}-school"><i class="fas fa-university me-2"></i>√âcole/Universit√©</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" id="${entryId}-degree" name="education[degree][]" placeholder="Dipl√¥me/Certificat" value="${data.degree || ''}" required>
                            <label for="${entryId}-degree"><i class="fas fa-graduation-cap me-2"></i>Dipl√¥me/Certificat</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control date-picker" id="${entryId}-from" name="education[from][]" placeholder="De" value="${data.from || ''}">
                            <label for="${entryId}-from"><i class="fas fa-calendar-alt me-2"></i>De</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control date-picker" id="${entryId}-to" name="education[to][]" placeholder="√Ä" value="${data.to || ''}">
                            <label for="${entryId}-to"><i class="fas fa-calendar-alt me-2"></i>√Ä (ou pr√©vu)</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-12">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <textarea class="form-control" id="${entryId}-description" name="education[description][]" placeholder="Description" style="height: 100px">${data.description || ''}</textarea>
                            <label for="${entryId}-description"><i class="fas fa-align-left me-2"></i>Description</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    `;

    // Add before the "Add More" button
    educationEntries.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', entryHTML);

    // Initialize event listeners for the new entry
    const newEntry = document.getElementById(entryId);

    // Remove button
    newEntry.querySelector('.remove-entry').addEventListener('click', function() {
        removeEntry(entryId, 'education');
    });

    // Initialize flatpickr for date fields if available
    if (typeof flatpickr !== 'undefined') {
        flatpickr(`#${entryId}-from`, {
            allowInput: true,
            dateFormat: 'M Y'
        });

        flatpickr(`#${entryId}-to`, {
            allowInput: true,
            dateFormat: 'M Y'
        });
    }

    // Update preview when education entry changes
    const updatePreviewEducation = () => {
        // Get all education entries
        const allEntries = document.querySelectorAll('.education-entry');

        // Get the preview section for education
        const previewSection = document.querySelector('.preview-section h4:contains("Formation")');
        if (previewSection) {
            const parentSection = previewSection.closest('.preview-section');

            // Clear existing entries
            const existingEntries = parentSection.querySelectorAll('.preview-entry');
            existingEntries.forEach(entry => entry.remove());

            // Add new entries
            allEntries.forEach(entry => {
                const school = entry.querySelector('input[name="education[school][]"]').value || '√âcole';
                const degree = entry.querySelector('input[name="education[degree][]"]').value || 'Dipl√¥me';
                const from = entry.querySelector('input[name="education[from][]"]').value || '';
                const to = entry.querySelector('input[name="education[to][]"]').value || '';

                const period = from && to ? `${from} - ${to}` : (from ? `Depuis ${from}` : `Jusqu'√† ${to}`);

                const previewEntry = document.createElement('div');
                previewEntry.className = 'preview-entry';
                previewEntry.innerHTML = `
                    <h5>${degree}</h5>
                    <h6>${school} | ${period}</h6>
                `;

                parentSection.appendChild(previewEntry);
            });
        }
    };

    // Add change event to all inputs in this education entry
    newEntry.querySelectorAll('input, textarea').forEach(input => {
        input.addEventListener('change', updatePreviewEducation);
        input.addEventListener('blur', updatePreviewEducation);
    });

    // Update preview immediately
    updatePreviewEducation();

    return entryId;
}

// Function to initialize experience section
function initExperienceSection() {
    // Initialize Add First Experience button
    const addFirstExperienceBtn = document.getElementById('addFirstExperience');
    if (addFirstExperienceBtn) {
        addFirstExperienceBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            addExperienceEntry();
            document.getElementById('experienceEmptyState').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('addMoreExperienceBtnContainer').style.display = 'block';
        });
    }

    // Initialize Add Another Experience button
    const addExperienceBtn = document.getElementById('addExperience');
    if (addExperienceBtn) {
        addExperienceBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            addExperienceEntry();
        });
    }
}

// Function to add a new experience entry
function addExperienceEntry(data = {}) {
    const experienceEntries = document.getElementById('experienceEntries');
    const entryId = 'experience-' + new Date().getTime();

    const entryHTML = `
        <div class="card shadow-sm mb-3 fade-in experience-entry" id="${entryId}">
            <div class="card-header d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Exp√©rience professionnelle</h5>
                <div class="card-actions">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger remove-entry" title="Supprimer">
                        <i class="fas fa-trash-alt"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary ms-1 drag-handle" title="R√©organiser">
                        <i class="fas fa-arrows-alt"></i>
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-3">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" id="${entryId}-company" name="experience[company][]" placeholder="Entreprise" value="${data.company || ''}" required>
                            <label for="${entryId}-company"><i class="fas fa-building me-2"></i>Entreprise</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" id="${entryId}-position" name="experience[position][]" placeholder="Poste" value="${data.position || ''}" required>
                            <label for="${entryId}-position"><i class="fas fa-briefcase me-2"></i>Poste</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control date-picker" id="${entryId}-from" name="experience[from][]" placeholder="De" value="${data.from || ''}">
                            <label for="${entryId}-from"><i class="fas fa-calendar-alt me-2"></i>De</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control date-picker" id="${entryId}-to" name="experience[to][]" placeholder="√Ä" value="${data.to || ''}">
                            <label for="${entryId}-to"><i class="fas fa-calendar-alt me-2"></i>√Ä (vide si poste actuel)</label>
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-check mt-2">
                            <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="${entryId}-current" name="experience[current][]" value="1" ${data.current ? 'checked' : ''}>
                            <label class="form-check-label" for="${entryId}-current">
                                <i class="fas fa-clock me-1"></i> Poste actuel
                            </label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-12">
                        <div class="form-floating">
                            <textarea class="form-control" id="${entryId}-description" name="experience[description][]" placeholder="Description" style="height: 100px">${data.description || ''}</textarea>
                            <label for="${entryId}-description"><i class="fas fa-align-left me-2"></i>Description</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    `;

    // Add before the "Add More" button
    experienceEntries.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', entryHTML);

    // Initialize event listeners for the new entry
    const newEntry = document.getElementById(entryId);

    // Remove button
    newEntry.querySelector('.remove-entry').addEventListener('click', function() {
        removeEntry(entryId, 'experience');
    });

    // Current checkbox logic
    const currentCheckbox = newEntry.querySelector(`#${entryId}-current`);
    const toField = newEntry.querySelector(`#${entryId}-to`);

    currentCheckbox.addEventListener('change', function() {
        if (this.checked) {
            toField.value = '';
            toField.disabled = true;
            toField.parentElement.classList.add('opacity-50');
        } else {
            toField.disabled = false;
            toField.parentElement.classList.remove('opacity-50');
        }

        // Update preview when current status changes
        updatePreviewExperience();
    });

    // Initialize flatpickr for date fields if available
    if (typeof flatpickr !== 'undefined') {
        flatpickr(`#${entryId}-from`, {
            allowInput: true,
            dateFormat: 'M Y'
        });

        flatpickr(`#${entryId}-to`, {
            allowInput: true,
            dateFormat: 'M Y'
        });
    }

    // If current is checked, disable to field
    if (currentCheckbox.checked) {
        toField.value = '';
        toField.disabled = true;
        toField.parentElement.classList.add('opacity-50');
    }

    // Update preview when experience entry changes
    const updatePreviewExperience = () => {
        // Get all experience entries
        const allEntries = document.querySelectorAll('.experience-entry');

        // Get the preview section for experience
        const previewSection = document.querySelector('.preview-section h4:contains("Exp√©rience")');
        if (previewSection) {
            const parentSection = previewSection.closest('.preview-section');

            // Clear existing entries
            const existingEntries = parentSection.querySelectorAll('.preview-entry');
            existingEntries.forEach(entry => entry.remove());

            // Add new entries
            allEntries.forEach(entry => {
                const company = entry.querySelector('input[name="experience[company][]"]').value || 'Entreprise';
                const position = entry.querySelector('input[name="experience[position][]"]').value || 'Poste';
                const from = entry.querySelector('input[name="experience[from][]"]').value || '';
                const to = entry.querySelector('input[name="experience[to][]"]').value || '';
                const isCurrent = entry.querySelector('input[name="experience[current][]"]').checked;

                const period = from && (to || isCurrent) ?
                    `${from} - ${isCurrent ? 'pr√©sent' : to}` :
                    (from ? `Depuis ${from}` : `Jusqu'√† ${to}`);

                const previewEntry = document.createElement('div');
                previewEntry.className = 'preview-entry';
                previewEntry.innerHTML = `
                    <h5>${position}</h5>
                    <h6>${company} | ${period}</h6>
                `;

                parentSection.appendChild(previewEntry);
            });
        }
    };

    // Add change event to all inputs in this experience entry
    newEntry.querySelectorAll('input, textarea').forEach(input => {
        input.addEventListener('change', updatePreviewExperience);
        input.addEventListener('blur', updatePreviewExperience);
    });

    // Update preview immediately
    updatePreviewExperience();

    return entryId;
}

// Function to remove an entry (education or experience)
function removeEntry(entryId, type) {
    const entry = document.getElementById(entryId);

    if (entry) {
        // Fade out animation
        entry.style.opacity = '0';
        entry.style.transform = 'translateY(-20px)';

        setTimeout(() => {
            entry.remove();

            // Check if there are any more entries
            const entries = document.querySelectorAll(`.${type}-entry`);
            if (entries.length === 0) {
                document.getElementById(`${type}EmptyState`).style.display = 'block';
                document.getElementById(`addMore${type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + type.slice(1)}BtnContainer`).style.display = 'none';
            }

            // Update preview
            if (type === 'education') {
                // Trigger update for education preview
                document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('updateEducationPreview'));
            } else if (type === 'experience') {
                // Trigger update for experience preview
                document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('updateExperiencePreview'));
            }
        }, 300);
    }
}

// Function to initialize skills section
function initSkillsSection() {
    const skillInput = document.getElementById('skillInput');
    const addSkillBtn = document.getElementById('addSkillBtn');
    const skillsContainer = document.getElementById('skillsContainer');
    const skillsEmptyState = document.getElementById('skillsEmptyState');
    const quickSkillButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.quick-skill');

    if (skillInput && addSkillBtn && skillsContainer) {
        // Add skill function
        const addSkill = (skillText) => {
            // Don't add empty skills
            if (!skillText.trim()) return;

            // Check if skill already exists
            const existingSkills = Array.from(skillsContainer.querySelectorAll('input[name="skills[]"]')).map(input => input.value.toLowerCase());
            if (existingSkills.includes(skillText.toLowerCase())) {
                showNotification('Cette comp√©tence existe d√©j√†', 'warning');
                return;
            }

            // Create new skill badge
            const skillBadge = document.createElement('div');
            skillBadge.className = 'badge bg-primary fs-6 me-2 mb-2 d-flex align-items-center';
            skillBadge.innerHTML = `
                ${skillText}
                <button type="button" class="btn-close btn-close-white ms-2" aria-label="Supprimer la comp√©tence"></button>
                <input type="hidden" name="skills[]" value="${skillText}">
            `;

            // Add remove button functionality
            const removeBtn = skillBadge.querySelector('.btn-close');
            removeBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                skillBadge.remove();
                updateSkillsEmptyState();
                updateSkillsPreview();
            });

            // Add to container
            skillsContainer.appendChild(skillBadge);

            // Hide empty state
            skillsEmptyState.style.display = 'none';

            // Update preview
            updateSkillsPreview();

            // Clear input
            skillInput.value = '';
            skillInput.focus();
        };

        // Update empty state visibility
        const updateSkillsEmptyState = () => {
            if (skillsContainer.children.length === 0) {
                skillsEmptyState.style.display = 'block';
            } else {
                skillsEmptyState.style.display = 'none';
            }
        };

        // Update skills in preview
        const updateSkillsPreview = () => {
            const previewSkillsContainer = document.querySelector('.preview-skills');
            if (previewSkillsContainer) {
                // Clear existing skills
                previewSkillsContainer.innerHTML = '';

                // Get all skills
                const skills = Array.from(skillsContainer.querySelectorAll('input[name="skills[]"]')).map(input => input.value);

                // Add skills to preview (limit to 10 for preview)
                const displaySkills = skills.slice(0, 10);

                displaySkills.forEach(skill => {
                    const skillBadge = document.createElement('span');
                    skillBadge.className = 'skill-badge';
                    skillBadge.textContent = skill;
                    previewSkillsContainer.appendChild(skillBadge);
                });

                // If more than 10 skills, add indicator
                if (skills.length > 10) {
                    const moreIndicator = document.createElement('span');
                    moreIndicator.className = 'skill-badge more-skills';
                    moreIndicator.textContent = `+${skills.length - 10}`;
                    previewSkillsContainer.appendChild(moreIndicator);
                }

                // If no skills, add placeholder
                if (skills.length === 0) {
                    const defaultSkills = ['JavaScript', 'HTML/CSS', 'Symfony'];
                    defaultSkills.forEach(skill => {
                        const skillBadge = document.createElement('span');
                        skillBadge.className = 'skill-badge';
                        skillBadge.textContent = skill;
                        previewSkillsContainer.appendChild(skillBadge);
                    });
                }
            }
        };

        // Add via button click
        addSkillBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            addSkill(skillInput.value);
        });

        // Add via Enter key
        skillInput.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
            if (e.key === 'Enter') {
                e.preventDefault();
                addSkill(this.value);
            }
        });

        // Add quick skills
        quickSkillButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                addSkill(this.textContent);
            });
        });
    }
}

// Function for autofilling the form with sample data (for testing)
function autofillForm() {
    // Personal Information
    document.getElementById('firstName').value = 'Mohamed';
    document.getElementById('lastName').value = 'Abidi';
    document.getElementById('email').value = 'mohamed.abidi@esprit.tn';
    document.getElementById('phone').value = '+216 23 199 953';
    document.getElementById('position').value = 'Business Information Systems';
    document.getElementById('address').value = 'Sousse, Hammamet Sud / Tozeur, Nefta';
    document.getElementById('website').value = 'www.mohamed-abidi.com';
    document.getElementById('linkedin').value = 'linkedin.com/in/mohamed-abidi';
    document.getElementById('summary').value = 'BAC + 3 en informatique de gestion, √©tudiant √† ESPRIT SCHOOL OF BUSINESS. Sp√©cialis√© en d√©veloppement web avec le stack MERN et en gestion des donn√©es. Exp√©rience en gestion de sponsoring et administration de club.';

    // Trigger summary character counter
    document.getElementById('summary').dispatchEvent(new Event('input'));

    // Add education
    document.getElementById('addFirstEducation').click();
    const eduId = document.querySelector('.education-entry').id;
    document.getElementById(`${eduId}-school`).value = 'ESPRIT SCHOOL OF BUSINESS';
    document.getElementById(`${eduId}-degree`).value = 'Licence en Business Computing';
    document.getElementById(`${eduId}-from`).value = 'Sep 2021';
    document.getElementById(`${eduId}-to`).value = 'Pr√©sent';
    document.getElementById(`${eduId}-description`).value = 'Parcours en Business Information Systems (BIS), sp√©cialisation en d√©veloppement web et gestion des donn√©es.';

    // Add a second education
    document.getElementById('addEducation').click();
    const eduId2 = document.querySelectorAll('.education-entry')[1].id;
    document.getElementById(`${eduId2}-school`).value = 'Lyc√©e BECHIR KHRAYEF NEFTA';
    document.getElementById(`${eduId2}-degree`).value = 'Baccalaur√©at Sciences';
    document.getElementById(`${eduId2}-from`).value = 'Sep 2019';
    document.getElementById(`${eduId2}-to`).value = 'Juin 2020';
    document.getElementById(`${eduId2}-description`).value = 'Formation scientifique g√©n√©rale ayant permis l\'admission √† ESPRIT SCHOOL OF BUSINESS.';

    // Add experience
    document.getElementById('addFirstExperience').click();
    const expId = document.querySelector('.experience-entry').id;
    document.getElementById(`${expId}-company`).value = 'TUNIVISIONS ESPRIT';
    document.getElementById(`${expId}-position`).value = 'Responsable Sponsoring';
    document.getElementById(`${expId}-from`).value = 'Oct 2022';
    document.getElementById(`${expId}-description`).value = 'Gestion du secteur du club Tunivisions Esprit, avec responsabilit√© de la recherche et n√©gociation des partenariats. Membre du conseil d\'administration du club Tunivisions Esprit, participant aux d√©cisions strat√©giques et √† la gouvernance.';
    document.getElementById(`${expId}-current`).checked = true;
    document.getElementById(`${expId}-current`).dispatchEvent(new Event('change'));

    // Add skills
    const skills = ['MERN Stack', 'JavaScript', 'React', 'Node.js', 'MongoDB', 'Express', 'Big Data', 'Gestion', '√âconomie', 'Administration'];
    const skillInput = document.getElementById('skillInput');

    skills.forEach(skill => {
        skillInput.value = skill;
        document.getElementById('addSkillBtn').click();
    });

    // Navigate to first section to update display
    navigateToSection(1);

    // Show success message
    showNotification('Exemple de CV charg√© avec succ√®s !', 'success');
}
==================================================

Fichier: public\js\section_editor.js
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\public\js\section_editor.js
-----
/**
 * Section Editor JS
 * Handles section selection and drag-and-drop reordering
 */
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // S√©lecteur de sections
    initSectionSelector();

    // √âditeur drag-and-drop
    initSectionEditor();

    function initSectionSelector() {
        const sectionItems = document.querySelectorAll('.section-item');

        sectionItems.forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (this.classList.contains('disabled')) return;

                // Activer la section cliqu√©e
                sectionItems.forEach(i => i.classList.remove('active'));
                this.classList.add('active');

                // R√©cup√©rer la section
                const section = this.getAttribute('data-section');

                // Simuler la navigation vers cette section
                console.log(`Naviguer vers la section: ${section}`);

                // Afficher un feedback
                if (typeof showFeedback === 'function') {
                    showFeedback(`Section "${section}" s√©lectionn√©e`, 'info');
                }
            });
        });
    }

    function initSectionEditor() {
        const sortableList = document.getElementById('sortableSections');
        if (!sortableList) return;

        // Initialiser le drag-and-drop avec SortableJS
        if (typeof Sortable !== 'undefined') {
            new Sortable(sortableList, {
                animation: 150,
                handle: '.sortable-handle',
                ghostClass: 'dragging',
                onEnd: function(evt) {
                    // Mettre √† jour l'ordre des sections apr√®s un glisser-d√©poser
                    updateSectionOrder();
                }
            });
        } else {
            console.warn('SortableJS not loaded. Drag-and-drop functionality disabled.');
        }

        // Gestionnaires d'√©v√©nements pour les actions
        sortableList.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            const target = e.target.closest('button');
            if (!target) return;

            const sectionItem = target.closest('.sortable-section-item');
            const section = sectionItem.getAttribute('data-section');

            if (target.classList.contains('toggle-visibility')) {
                toggleSectionVisibility(target, sectionItem, section);
            } else if (target.classList.contains('remove')) {
                removeSection(sectionItem, section);
            }
        });

        // Gestionnaire pour le bouton d'ajout de section
        const addSectionBtn = document.getElementById('addSectionBtn');
        if (addSectionBtn) {
            addSectionBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                showAddSectionDialog();
            });
        }
    }

    function toggleSectionVisibility(button, sectionItem, section) {
        const isVisible = button.classList.contains('visible');

        if (isVisible) {
            // Rendre la section invisible
            button.classList.remove('visible');
            button.classList.add('hidden');
            button.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-eye-slash"></i>';
            button.title = "Rendre visible";
            sectionItem.classList.add('disabled');

            // Dans une application r√©elle, mettre √† jour l'√©tat
            console.log(`Section ${section} est maintenant cach√©e`);

            // Afficher un feedback
            if (typeof showFeedback === 'function') {
                showFeedback(`Section "${section}" masqu√©e`, 'info');
            }
        } else {
            // Rendre la section visible
            button.classList.remove('hidden');
            button.classList.add('visible');
            button.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-eye"></i>';
            button.title = "Masquer";
            sectionItem.classList.remove('disabled');

            // Dans une application r√©elle, mettre √† jour l'√©tat
            console.log(`Section ${section} est maintenant visible`);

            // Afficher un feedback
            if (typeof showFeedback === 'function') {
                showFeedback(`Section "${section}" rendue visible`, 'info');
            }
        }
    }

    function removeSection(sectionItem, section) {
        // Animation de suppression
        sectionItem.style.opacity = '0';
        sectionItem.style.height = `${sectionItem.offsetHeight}px`;

        setTimeout(() => {
            sectionItem.style.height = '0';
            sectionItem.style.padding = '0';
            sectionItem.style.margin = '0';
            sectionItem.style.border = 'none';

            setTimeout(() => {
                sectionItem.remove();
                // Dans une application r√©elle, mettre √† jour l'√©tat
                console.log(`Section ${section} supprim√©e`);
                updateSectionOrder();

                // Afficher un feedback
                if (typeof showFeedback === 'function') {
                    showFeedback(`Section "${section}" supprim√©e`, 'warning');
                }
            }, 300);
        }, 300);
    }

    function updateSectionOrder() {
        // R√©cup√©rer l'ordre actuel des sections
        const sections = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.sortable-section-item'))
            .map(item => ({
                id: item.getAttribute('data-section'),
                visible: !item.classList.contains('disabled')
            }));

        // Dans une application r√©elle, vous enverriez cet ordre au serveur ou le sauvegarderiez localement
        console.log('Nouvel ordre des sections:', sections);
        localStorage.setItem('sectionOrder', JSON.stringify(sections));

        // Afficher un feedback
        if (typeof showFeedback === 'function') {
            showFeedback('Ordre des sections mis √† jour', 'success');
        }
    }

    function showAddSectionDialog() {
        // Simuler l'affichage d'une bo√Æte de dialogue pour ajouter une nouvelle section
        if (typeof showFeedback === 'function') {
            showFeedback('Fonctionnalit√© d\'ajout de section bient√¥t disponible', 'info');
        } else {
            alert('Dans une application r√©elle, une bo√Æte de dialogue s\'ouvrirait ici pour ajouter une nouvelle section.');
        }
    }
});

Fichier: public\js\sidebar.js
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\public\js\sidebar.js
-----
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // R√©cup√©ration des √©l√©ments DOM
    const sidebar = document.getElementById('templateSidebar');
    const mainContent = document.querySelector('.main-content') || document.body;
    const sidebarToggle = document.getElementById('sidebarToggle');
    const closeSidebar = document.getElementById('closeSidebar');
    const sidebarOverlay = document.getElementById('sidebarOverlay');
    const templateItems = document.querySelectorAll('.template-item');
    const filterOptions = document.querySelectorAll('.filter-option');

    // Fonction pour afficher/masquer la sidebar sur mobile
    function toggleSidebar() {
        sidebar.classList.toggle('active');
        sidebarOverlay.classList.toggle('active');
        document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open');
    }

    // √âcouteurs d'√©v√©nements pour la sidebar
    if (sidebarToggle) {
        sidebarToggle.addEventListener('click', toggleSidebar);
    }

    if (closeSidebar) {
        closeSidebar.addEventListener('click', toggleSidebar);
    }

    if (sidebarOverlay) {
        sidebarOverlay.addEventListener('click', toggleSidebar);
    }

    // S√©lection d'un template
    templateItems.forEach(item => {
        item.addEventListener('click', function() {
            // Supprimer la classe selected de tous les templates
            templateItems.forEach(el => {
                el.classList.remove('selected');
            });

            // Ajouter la classe selected au template cliqu√©
            this.classList.add('selected');

            // R√©cup√©rer l'identifiant du template s√©lectionn√©
            const templateId = this.getAttribute('data-template');

            // Stocker la s√©lection (dans localStorage ou autre)
            localStorage.setItem('selectedTemplate', templateId);

            // D√©clencher un √©v√©nement personnalis√© pour informer d'autres scripts de la s√©lection
            const event = new CustomEvent('templateSelected', { detail: { templateId: templateId } });
            document.dispatchEvent(event);

            // Sur mobile, fermer la sidebar apr√®s la s√©lection
            if (window.innerWidth < 992) {
                toggleSidebar();
            }
        });
    });

    // Filtrage des templates
    filterOptions.forEach(option => {
        option.addEventListener('click', function() {
            const filterValue = this.getAttribute('data-filter');
            const filterGroup = this.closest('.filter-group');

            // Supprimer la classe active des autres options du m√™me groupe
            if (filterGroup) {
                const groupOptions = filterGroup.querySelectorAll('.filter-option');
                groupOptions.forEach(opt => {
                    opt.classList.remove('active');
                });
            }

            // Ajouter la classe active √† l'option cliqu√©e
            this.classList.add('active');

            // Filtrer les templates
            filterTemplates();
        });
    });

    // Fonction pour filtrer les templates en fonction des options s√©lectionn√©es
    function filterTemplates() {
        const activeFilters = [];

        // R√©cup√©rer tous les filtres actifs
        document.querySelectorAll('.filter-option.active').forEach(option => {
            const filter = option.getAttribute('data-filter');
            if (filter !== 'all') {
                activeFilters.push(filter);
            }
        });

        // Si aucun filtre actif, ou seulement des "all", afficher tous les templates
        if (activeFilters.length === 0) {
            templateItems.forEach(item => {
                item.style.display = 'block';
            });
            return;
        }

        // Appliquer les filtres
        templateItems.forEach(item => {
            const categories = item.getAttribute('data-category').split(' ');
            let shouldShow = false;

            // Si un template correspond √† au moins un des filtres actifs, l'afficher
            for (let filter of activeFilters) {
                if (categories.includes(filter)) {
                    shouldShow = true;
                    break;
                }
            }

            item.style.display = shouldShow ? 'block' : 'none';
        });
    }

    // V√©rifier s'il y a un template s√©lectionn√© en localStorage
    const savedTemplate = localStorage.getItem('selectedTemplate');
    if (savedTemplate) {
        const template = document.querySelector(`.template-item[data-template="${savedTemplate}"]`);
        if (template) {
            template.classList.add('selected');
        }
    }

    // Initialiser avec tous les templates visibles
    filterOptions[0].classList.add('active'); // Activer le filtre "Tous" par d√©faut
});
