{% block javascripts %}
    {{ parent() }}
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Sortable/1.15.0/Sortable.min.js"></script>
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        // Animation on scroll
        function animateOnScroll() {
            const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.animate-on-scroll');
            elements.forEach(element => {
                const position = element.getBoundingClientRect();
                if (position.top < window.innerHeight - 50) {
                    element.classList.add('animated');
                }
            });
        }

        window.addEventListener('scroll', animateOnScroll);
        window.addEventListener('load', animateOnScroll);
        animateOnScroll(); // Initial check on page load

        // Highlight drop target
        const builderArea = document.getElementById('builderArea');

        builderArea.addEventListener('dragover', () => {
            builderArea.classList.add('highlight');
        });

        builderArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
            builderArea.classList.remove('highlight');
        });

        builderArea.addEventListener('drop', () => {
            builderArea.classList.remove('highlight');
        });

        // Initialize component library sortable
        new Sortable(document.getElementById('componentLibrary'), {
            group: {
                name: 'shared',
                pull: 'clone',
                put: false
            },
            animation: 150,
            sort: false,
            handle: '.drag-handle',
            onClone: function(evt) {
                // Clone keeps the same dimensions as the original
                evt.item.classList.add('builder-component');
            }
        });

        // Initialize builder area sortable
        new Sortable(document.getElementById('builderArea'), {
            group: {
                name: 'shared',
                pull: false
            },
            animation: 150,
            handle: '.drag-handle',
            onAdd: function(evt) {
                // Clear placeholder message when items are added
                if (builderArea.querySelector('.text-center.text-muted')) {
                    builderArea.querySelector('.text-center.text-muted').remove();
                }

                // Add unique ID to each component in builder
                evt.item.id = 'component-' + Date.now();

                // Add edit and delete buttons
                const actionButtons = document.createElement('div');
                actionButtons.className = 'mt-3 mb-0 d-flex justify-content-end gap-2';
                actionButtons.innerHTML = `
                        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary edit-component">
                            <i class="fas fa-edit me-1"></i> Modifier
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger remove-component">
                            <i class="fas fa-trash-alt me-1"></i> Supprimer
                        </button>
                    `;
                evt.item.appendChild(actionButtons);

                // Add component style
                evt.item.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease';
                evt.item.style.marginBottom = '16px';
                evt.item.style.borderRadius = '8px';
                evt.item.style.boxShadow = '0 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)';

                // Animation for newly added component
                evt.item.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
                evt.item.style.opacity = '0';

                setTimeout(() => {
                    evt.item.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                    evt.item.style.opacity = '1';
                }, 10);

                // Add click to select
                evt.item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    if (!e.target.closest('button')) {
                        // Remove selection from all components
                        document.querySelectorAll('.builder-component').forEach(comp => {
                            comp.classList.remove('active');
                        });

                        // Add selection to this component
                        this.classList.add('active');
                    }
                });

                // Update preview and stats
                updatePreview();
                updateStats();
            },
            onChange: function() {
                updatePreview();
            },
            onSort: function() {
                updatePreview();
            }
        });

        // Handle color scheme selection
        document.querySelectorAll('.color-scheme').forEach(scheme => {
            scheme.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // Remove active class from all schemes
                document.querySelectorAll('.color-scheme').forEach(s => s.classList.remove('active'));

                // Add active class to clicked scheme
                this.classList.add('active');

                // Update preview with new color scheme
                updatePreview();

                // Apply color to buttons and other elements
                const primaryColor = window.getComputedStyle(this).backgroundColor;
                document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--primary-color', primaryColor);
            });
        });

        // Handle font selection
        document.getElementById('fontSelector').addEventListener('change', function() {
            const selectedFont = this.value;
            updatePreview();

            // Apply font to preview
            document.getElementById('cvPreview').style.fontFamily = selectedFont;
        });

        // Handle spacing adjustment
        document.getElementById('spacing').addEventListener('input', function() {
            updatePreview();
        });

        // Clear builder
        document.getElementById('clearBuilder').addEventListener('click', function() {
            if (confirm('√ätes-vous s√ªr de vouloir effacer tous les composants?')) {
                builderArea.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="text-center text-muted py-5">
                            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left fa-3x mb-3"></i>
                            <h5>Glissez les composants ici</h5>
                            <p>Construisez votre CV personnalis√© en ajoutant des composants depuis le panneau de gauche</p>
                        </div>
                    `;
                updatePreview();
                updateStats();
            }
        });

        // Auto-fill all button
        document.getElementById('autofillAllButton').addEventListener('click', function() {
            autoFillAllComponents();
        });

        // Function to auto-fill all components
        function autoFillAllComponents() {
            // Clear the builder area first
            builderArea.innerHTML = '';

            // Add all components in a sensible order
            const componentTypes = ['header', 'profile', 'experience', 'education', 'skills', 'languages', 'projects', 'references'];

            componentTypes.forEach((type, index) => {
                // Find this component in the library
                const originalComp = document.querySelector(`#componentLibrary .builder-component[data-type="${type}"]`);
                if (originalComp) {
                    const clonedComp = originalComp.cloneNode(true);
                    clonedComp.id = 'component-' + Date.now() + Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 5);

                    // Add animation delay for staggered effect
                    clonedComp.style.transitionDelay = `${index * 0.1}s`;

                    // Style
                    clonedComp.style.marginBottom = '16px';
                    clonedComp.style.borderRadius = '8px';
                    clonedComp.style.boxShadow = '0 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)';

                    // Add action buttons
                    const actionButtons = document.createElement('div');
                    actionButtons.className = 'mt-3 mb-0 d-flex justify-content-end gap-2';
                    actionButtons.innerHTML = `
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary edit-component">
                                <i class="fas fa-edit me-1"></i> Modifier
                            </button>
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger remove-component">
                                <i class="fas fa-trash-alt me-1"></i> Supprimer
                            </button>
                        `;
                    clonedComp.appendChild(actionButtons);

                    // Add click to select
                    clonedComp.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                        if (!e.target.closest('button')) {
                            // Remove selection from all components
                            document.querySelectorAll('.builder-component').forEach(comp => {
                                comp.classList.remove('active');
                            });

                            // Add selection to this component
                            this.classList.add('active');
                        }
                    });

                    builderArea.appendChild(clonedComp);
                }
            });

            // Update preview and stats
            updatePreview();
            updateStats();

            // Show success notification
            showNotification('CV rempli automatiquement avec succ√®s!', 'success');
        }

        // Enhanced notification function with types
        function showNotification(message, type = 'info') {
            // Remove any existing notifications
            const existingNotifications = document.querySelectorAll('.custom-notification');
            existingNotifications.forEach(notif => {
                document.body.removeChild(notif);
            });

            // Define colors based on type
            let bgColor, icon;
            switch(type) {
                case 'success':
                    bgColor = '#48bb78';
                    icon = 'check-circle';
                    break;
                case 'warning':
                    bgColor = '#ed8936';
                    icon = 'exclamation-triangle';
                    break;
                case 'error':
                    bgColor = '#e53e3e';
                    icon = 'times-circle';
                    break;
                default:
                    bgColor = '#3182ce';
                    icon = 'info-circle';
            }

            const notification = document.createElement('div');
            notification.className = 'custom-notification';
            notification.style.position = 'fixed';
            notification.style.bottom = '30px';
            notification.style.right = '30px';
            notification.style.backgroundColor = bgColor;
            notification.style.color = 'white';
            notification.style.padding = '15px 25px';
            notification.style.borderRadius = '10px';
            notification.style.boxShadow = '0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)';
            notification.style.zIndex = '9999';
            notification.style.display = 'flex';
            notification.style.alignItems = 'center';
            notification.style.minWidth = '300px';
            notification.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
            notification.style.opacity = '0';
            notification.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease';

            notification.innerHTML = `
                    <i class="fas fa-${icon} me-3" style="font-size: 1.5rem;"></i>
                    <div style="flex-grow: 1;">${message}</div>
                    <button type="button" style="background: none; border: none; color: white; font-size: 1rem; cursor: pointer; margin-left: 15px;">
                        <i class="fas fa-times"></i>
                    </button>
                `;

            document.body.appendChild(notification);

            // Animate in
            setTimeout(() => {
                notification.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                notification.style.opacity = '1';
            }, 10);

            // Add close button handler
            notification.querySelector('button').addEventListener('click', () => {
                notification.style.opacity = '0';
                notification.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
                setTimeout(() => document.body.removeChild(notification), 300);
            });

            // Auto remove after 4 seconds
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.body.contains(notification)) {
                    notification.style.opacity = '0';
                    notification.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        if (document.body.contains(notification)) {
                            document.body.removeChild(notification);
                        }
                    }, 300);
                }
            }, 4000);
        }

        // Save layout
        document.getElementById('saveLayout').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const layoutName = prompt('Entrez un nom pour cette mise en page:');
            if (layoutName) {
                // Get the current layout
                const layout = {
                    name: layoutName,
                    components: Array.from(builderArea.children)
                        .filter(el => el.dataset.type)
                        .map(el => {
                            return {
                                type: el.dataset.type,
                                id: el.id
                            };
                        }),
                    colorScheme: document.querySelector('.color-scheme.active').dataset.color,
                    font: document.getElementById('fontSelector').value,
                    spacing: document.getElementById('spacing').value,
                    timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
                };

                // Save to localStorage
                const savedLayouts = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cvLayouts') || '[]');
                savedLayouts.push(layout);
                localStorage.setItem('cvLayouts', JSON.stringify(savedLayouts));

                // Update saved layouts list
                updateSavedLayouts();

                // Show success message
                showNotification(`Mise en page "${layoutName}" sauvegard√©e avec succ√®s!`, 'success');
            }
        });

        // Event delegation for component actions
        builderArea.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            // Handle edit button click
            if (e.target.closest('.edit-component')) {
                const component = e.target.closest('.builder-component');
                editComponent(component);
            }

            // Handle remove button click
            if (e.target.closest('.remove-component')) {
                const component = e.target.closest('.builder-component');
                if (confirm('√ätes-vous s√ªr de vouloir supprimer ce composant?')) {
                    // Fade out animation
                    component.style.opacity = '0';
                    component.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';

                    setTimeout(() => {
                        component.remove();
                        updatePreview();
                        updateStats();
                    }, 300);
                }
            }
        });

        // Load saved layouts
        updateSavedLayouts();

        // Update statistics
        function updateStats() {
            const components = Array.from(builderArea.children).filter(el => el.dataset && el.dataset.type);
            document.getElementById('components-count').textContent = components.length;

            // Calculate completion rate (based on having at least 5 components)
            const completionRate = Math.min(100, Math.round(components.length / 5 * 100));
            document.getElementById('completion-rate').textContent = completionRate + '%';

            // Calculate impact score (fictional score)
            const impactScore = Math.min(10, Math.round(components.length * 1.5));
            document.getElementById('impact-score').textContent = impactScore;

            // Add counter animation
            animateCounters();
        }

        // Animate counters
        function animateCounters() {
            document.querySelectorAll('.statistic-number').forEach(counter => {
                const target = counter.textContent;
                const isPercentage = target.includes('%');
                const numTarget = parseInt(target);
                let count = 0;

                const interval = setInterval(() => {
                    count += Math.ceil(numTarget / 20);
                    if (count >= numTarget) {
                        counter.textContent = target;
                        clearInterval(interval);
                    } else {
                        counter.textContent = isPercentage ? count + '%' : count;
                    }
                }, 50);
            });
        }

        // Preview update function
        function updatePreview() {
            const preview = document.getElementById('cvPreview');
            const components = builderArea.children;

            if (components.length === 0 || (components.length === 1 && components[0].classList.contains('text-center'))) {
                preview.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="text-center text-muted py-5">
                            <i class="fas fa-file-alt fa-3x mb-3"></i>
                            <h5>Aper√ßu du CV</h5>
                            <p>Votre CV appara√Ætra ici</p>
                        </div>
                    `;
                return;
            }

            // Get selected style properties
            const colorScheme = document.querySelector('.color-scheme.active').dataset.color;
            const font = document.getElementById('fontSelector').value;
            const spacing = document.getElementById('spacing').value;
            // Get color value based on scheme
            let colorValue;
            switch(colorScheme) {
                case 'primary':
                    colorValue = '#6b46c1'; // Purple
                    break;
                case 'blue':
                    colorValue = '#3182ce'; // Blue
                    break;
                case 'teal':
                    colorValue = '#38b2ac'; // Teal
                    break;
                case 'green':
                    colorValue = '#48bb78'; // Green
                    break;
                case 'orange':
                    colorValue = '#ed8936'; // Orange
                    break;
                case 'red':
                    colorValue = '#e53e3e'; // Red
                    break;
                default:
                    colorValue = '#6b46c1'; // Default Purple
            }

            // Create HTML for preview
            let previewHtml = `
                    <style>
                        #cvPreview {
                            font-family: ${font};
                            line-height: ${spacing};
                            color: #2d3748;
                        }
                        .preview-section {
                            margin-bottom: 18px;
                        }
                        .preview-header {
                            color: ${colorValue};
                            border-bottom: 2px solid: ${colorValue};
                            padding-bottom: 5px;
                            margin-bottom: 10px;
                            font-weight: 600;
                        }
                        .preview-subsection {
                            margin-bottom: 12px;
                        }
                        .badge {
                            background-color: ${colorValue};
                            color: white;
                            font-weight: 500;
                            padding: 3px 8px;
                            border-radius: 4px;
                            display: inline-block;
                            margin-right: 5px;
                            margin-bottom: 5px;
                            font-size: 0.75rem;
                        }
                    </style>
                `;

            // Generate preview content based on components
            Array.from(components).forEach(component => {
                if (!component.dataset || !component.dataset.type) return;

                switch(component.dataset.type) {
                    case 'header':
                        previewHtml += `
                                <div class="preview-section">
                                    <h1 style="color: ${colorValue}; margin-bottom: 5px; font-weight: 700;">Ahmed Ben Salem</h1>
                                    <div class="d-flex justify-content-between">
                                        <div>D√©veloppeur Full Stack</div>
                                        <div>ahmed.bensalem@example.com ‚Ä¢ +216 55 123 456</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            `;
                        break;
                    case 'profile':
                        previewHtml += `
                                <div class="preview-section">
                                    <h4 class="preview-header">Profil</h4>
                                    <p>D√©veloppeur passionn√© avec 5 ans d'exp√©rience en d√©veloppement web et mobile. Sp√©cialis√© en React, Node.js et technologies cloud. Orient√© solutions, avec une forte capacit√© √† r√©soudre des probl√®mes complexes.</p>
                                </div>
                            `;
                        break;
                    case 'experience':
                        previewHtml += `
                                <div class="preview-section">
                                    <h4 class="preview-header">Exp√©rience Professionnelle</h4>
                                    <div class="preview-subsection">
                                        <div class="d-flex justify-content-between">
                                            <strong>D√©veloppeur Senior</strong>
                                            <span>2020 - Pr√©sent</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="color: ${colorValue}; font-weight: 500;">Tech Solutions Tunisie</div>
                                        <ul style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 10px;">
                                            <li>D√©veloppement d'applications web pour des clients internationaux</li>
                                            <li>Optimisation des performances des applications existantes (+40% de vitesse)</li>
                                            <li>Leadership technique pour une √©quipe de 5 d√©veloppeurs</li>
                                        </ul>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="preview-subsection">
                                        <div class="d-flex justify-content-between">
                                            <strong>D√©veloppeur Web</strong>
                                            <span>2018 - 2020</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="color: ${colorValue}; font-weight: 500;">Digital Innovations SARL</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            `;
                        break;
                    case 'education':
                        previewHtml += `
                                <div class="preview-section">
                                    <h4 class="preview-header">Formation</h4>
                                    <div class="preview-subsection">
                                        <div class="d-flex justify-content-between">
                                            <strong>Dipl√¥me d'Ing√©nieur en Informatique</strong>
                                            <span>2016 - 2020</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="color: ${colorValue}; font-weight: 500;">√âcole Sup√©rieure Priv√©e d'Ing√©nierie et de Technologies (ESPRIT)</div>
                                        <div style="margin-top: 5px; font-style: italic;">Sp√©cialisation en d√©veloppement logiciel et syst√®mes d'information</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            `;
                        break;
                    case 'skills':
                        previewHtml += `
                                <div class="preview-section">
                                    <h4 class="preview-header">Comp√©tences</h4>
                                    <div class="d-flex flex-wrap">
                                        <span class="badge">JavaScript</span>
                                        <span class="badge">React</span>

        // Edit component function
        function editComponent(component) {
            const modal = document.getElementById('componentEditorModal');
            const modalContent = document.getElementById('componentEditorContent');
            const type = component.dataset.type;
            const modalTitle = document.querySelector('#componentEditorModal .modal-title');

            // Set modal title based on component type
            let title = '';
            let icon = '';
            switch(type) {
                case 'header':
                    title = 'Modifier l\'en-t√™te';
                    icon = 'heading';
                    break;
                case 'profile':
                    title = 'Modifier le profil';
                    icon = 'user';
                    break;
                case 'experience':
                    title = 'Modifier l\'exp√©rience professionnelle';
                    icon = 'briefcase';
                    break;
                case 'education':
                    title = 'Modifier la formation';
                    icon = 'graduation-cap';
                    break;
                case 'skills':
                    title = 'Modifier les comp√©tences';
                    icon = 'star';
                    break;
                case 'languages':
                    title = 'Modifier les langues';
                    icon = 'language';
                    break;
                case 'projects':
                    title = 'Modifier les projets';
                    icon = 'code';
                    break;
                case 'references':
                    title = 'Modifier les r√©f√©rences';
                    icon = 'comment';
                    break;
                default:
                    title = 'Modifier le composant';
                    icon = 'edit';
            }

            modalTitle.innerHTML = `<i class="fas fa-${icon} me-2"></i>${title}`;

            // Set different editor content based on component type
            let editorHtml = '';
            switch(type) {
                case 'header':
                    editorHtml = `
                            <div class="row mb-3">
                                <div class="col-md-6">

            modalContent.innerHTML = editorHtml;

            // Store reference to edited component
            document.getElementById('saveComponentChanges').dataset.componentId = component.id;

            // Show modal
            const bsModal = new bootstrap.Modal(modal);
            bsModal.show();
        }

        // Save component changes
        document.getElementById('saveComponentChanges').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const componentId = this.dataset.componentId;
            const component = document.getElementById(componentId);

            // In a real app, you'd save the component configuration
            // For now, we'll just close the modal and update the preview
            bootstrap.Modal.getInstance(document.getElementById('componentEditorModal')).hide();

            // Show saving notification
            showNotification('Modifications enregistr√©es avec succ√®s', 'success');

            setTimeout(() => {
                updatePreview();
            }, 300);
        });

        // Update saved layouts list
        function updateSavedLayouts() {
            const savedLayoutsContainer = document.getElementById('savedLayouts');
            const savedLayouts = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cvLayouts') || '[]');

            if (savedLayouts.length === 0) {
                savedLayoutsContainer.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="text-center text-muted py-3">
                            <i class="fas fa-folder-open mb-2 fa-2x"></i>
                            <p class="mb-0">Aucune mise en page sauvegard√©e</p>
                        </div>
                    `;
                return;
            }

            let layoutsHtml = '';
            // Sort layouts by timestamp (most recent first)
            savedLayouts.sort((a, b) => new Date(b.timestamp || 0) - new Date(a.timestamp || 0));

            savedLayouts.forEach((layout, index) => {
                const date = layout.timestamp ? new Date(layout.timestamp).toLocaleDateString() : '';

                layoutsHtml += `
                        <a href="#" class="list-group-item list-group-item-action d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center layout-item" data-index="${index}">
                            <div>
                                <div class="fw-medium">${layout.name}</div>
                                ${date ? `<small class="text-muted">${date}</small>` : ''}
                            </div>
                            <div class="d-flex">
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-link text-primary load-layout me-2" title="Charger cette mise en page" data-index="${index}">
                                    <i class="fas fa-file-import"></i>
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-link text-danger delete-layout" title="Supprimer" data-index="${index}">
                                    <i class="fas fa-trash-alt"></i>
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </a>
                    `;
            });

            savedLayoutsContainer.innerHTML = layoutsHtml;

            // Add event listeners to layout buttons
            document.querySelectorAll('.load-layout').forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    e.stopPropagation();
                    const index = this.dataset.index;
                    loadLayout(index);
                });
            });

            document.querySelectorAll('.delete-layout').forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    e.stopPropagation();
                    const index = this.dataset.index;
                    if (confirm('√ätes-vous s√ªr de vouloir supprimer cette mise en page?')) {
                        const savedLayouts = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cvLayouts') || '[]');
                        // Store the name for notification
                        const layoutName = savedLayouts[index].name;
                        savedLayouts.splice(index, 1);
                        localStorage.setItem('cvLayouts', JSON.stringify(savedLayouts));
                        updateSavedLayouts();
                        showNotification(`Mise en page "${layoutName}" supprim√©e`, 'info');
                    }
                });
            });

            // Layout item click handler
            document.querySelectorAll('.layout-item').forEach(item => {
                item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    if (!e.target.closest('button')) {
                        const index = this.dataset.index;
                        loadLayout(index);
                    }
                });
            });
        }

        // Load layout function
        function loadLayout(index) {
            const savedLayouts = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cvLayouts') || '[]');
            const layout = savedLayouts[index];

            if (!layout) return;

            // Clear builder
            builderArea.innerHTML = '';

            // Add components from the library based on layout
            layout.components.forEach(comp => {
                // Find component in library
                const originalComp = document.querySelector(`#componentLibrary .builder-component[data-type="${comp.type}"]`);
                if (originalComp) {
                    const clonedComp = originalComp.cloneNode(true);
                    clonedComp.id = comp.id || 'component-' + Date.now();

                    // Style
                    clonedComp.style.marginBottom = '16px';
                    clonedComp.style.borderRadius = '8px';
                    clonedComp.style.boxShadow = '0 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)';

                    // Add action buttons
                    const actionButtons = document.createElement('div');
                    actionButtons.className = 'mt-3 mb-0 d-flex justify-content-end gap-2';
                    actionButtons.innerHTML = `
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary edit-component">
                                <i class="fas fa-edit me-1"></i> Modifier
                            </button>
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger remove-component">
                                <i class="fas fa-trash-alt me-1"></i> Supprimer
                            </button>
                        `;
                    clonedComp.appendChild(actionButtons);

                    // Add click to select
                    clonedComp.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                        if (!e.target.closest('button')) {
                            // Remove selection from all components
                            document.querySelectorAll('.builder-component').forEach(comp => {
                                comp.classList.remove('active');
                            });

                            // Add selection to this component
                            this.classList.add('active');
                        }
                    });

                    builderArea.appendChild(clonedComp);
                }
            });

            // Set color scheme
            document.querySelectorAll('.color-scheme').forEach(scheme => {
                scheme.classList.remove('active');
                if (scheme.dataset.color === layout.colorScheme) {
                    scheme.classList.add('active');
                }
            });

            // Set font
            document.getElementById('fontSelector').value = layout.font || "'Poppins', sans-serif";

            // Set spacing
            document.getElementById('spacing').value = layout.spacing || 1.5;

            // Update preview and stats
            updatePreview();
            updateStats();

            // Show notification
            showNotification(`Mise en page "${layout.name}" charg√©e avec succ√®s!`, 'success');
        }

        // Initialize any floating animations
        function initFloatingAnimations() {
            const floatingElements = document.querySelectorAll('.autofill-all-btn, .card');

            floatingElements.forEach(element => {
                // Create random subtle floating animation
                const randomX = Math.random() * 10 - 5; // -5 to 5
                const randomY = Math.random() * 10 - 5; // -5 to 5
                const randomDelay = Math.random() * 2; // 0 to 2
                const randomDuration = 3 + Math.random() * 2; // 3 to 5

                element.style.transition = `transform ${randomDuration}s ease-in-out ${randomDelay}s`;

                setInterval(() => {
                    element.style.transform = `translate(${randomX / 4}px, ${randomY / 4}px)`;
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        element.style.transform = 'translate(0, 0)';
                    }, randomDuration * 500);
                }, randomDuration * 1000);
            });
        }

        // Initialize the floating animations
        setTimeout(initFloatingAnimations, 1000);
    });
</script>
{% endblock %}
==================================================

Fichier: Templates\cv_generator\cv_template.html.twig
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\Templates\cv_generator\cv_template.html.twig
-----
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>{{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }} - CV</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: 'DejaVu Sans', Arial, sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: #333;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        .header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .photo {
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            overflow: hidden;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
        }

        .photo img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: 24px;
            margin: 0 0 5px;
            color: #ee3124;
        }

        .contact-info {
            font-size: 14px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .section {
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }

        h2 {
            font-size: 18px;
            color: #ee3124;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
            padding-bottom: 5px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .entry {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .entry-title {
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 3px;
        }

        .entry-subtitle {
            font-style: italic;
            margin-bottom: 3px;
        }

        .entry-period {
            font-size: 13px;
            color: #666;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .skills-list {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .skill-item {
            background-color: #f5f5f5;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            margin-right: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            border-radius: 3px;
            font-size: 13px;
        }

        .footer {
            text-align: center;
            margin-top: 40px;
            font-size: 12px;
            color: #999;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
<div class="container">
    <div class="header">
        {% if photoData is defined and photoData %}
            <div class="photo">
                <img src="{{ photoData }}" alt="Profile Photo">
            </div>
        {% endif %}

        <h1>{{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }}</h1>

        <div class="contact-info">
            {% if data.email %}
                {{ data.email }}{% if data.phone %} | {% endif %}
            {% endif %}

            {% if data.phone %}
                {{ data.phone }}
            {% endif %}
        </div>

        {% if data.address or data.city or data.country %}
            <div class="contact-info">
                {{ [data.address, data.city, data.country]|filter(v => v is not empty)|join(', ') }}
            </div>
        {% endif %}
    </div>

    {% if data.education is defined and data.education|length > 0 %}
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Education</h2>

            {% for education in data.education %}
                <div class="entry">
                    <div class="entry-title">{{ education.degree }}</div>
                    <div class="entry-subtitle">{{ education.institution }}{% if education.location %}, {{ education.location }}{% endif %}</div>
                    <div class="entry-period">{{ education.startDate }}{% if education.startDate and education.endDate %} - {% endif %}{{ education.endDate }}</div>
                    {% if education.description %}
                        <div>{{ education.description }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                </div>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if data.experience is defined and data.experience|length > 0 %}
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Professional Experience</h2>

            {% for experience in data.experience %}
                <div class="entry">
                    <div class="entry-title">{{ experience.position }}</div>
                    <div class="entry-subtitle">{{ experience.company }}{% if experience.location %}, {{ experience.location }}{% endif %}</div>
                    <div class="entry-period">{{ experience.startDate }}{% if experience.startDate and experience.endDate %} - {% endif %}{{ experience.endDate }}</div>
                    {% if experience.description %}
                        <div>{{ experience.description }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                </div>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if data.skills is defined and data.skills|length > 0 %}
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Skills</h2>

            <div class="skills-list">
                {% for skill in data.skills %}
                    <div class="skill-item">{{ skill }}</div>
                {% endfor %}
            </div>
        </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if data.additionalInfo %}
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Additional Information</h2>

            <div>{{ data.additionalInfo }}</div>
        </div>
    {% endif %}

    <div class="footer">
        <p>CV generated on {{ generatedDate|date('F d, Y') }} using ESPRIT CV Generator</p>
    </div>
</div>

            --primary: #3498db;

            --accent: #1abc9c;
            --dark: #212529;
            --light: #f8f9fa;
            --gray: #6c757d;
            --border: #dee2e6;
            --white: #ffffff;
        }

            font-family: 'DejaVu Sans', sans-serif;
            color: var(--dark);
            background-color: var(--light);
            line-height: 1.7;

            padding: 0;
        }

            max-width: 1140px;
            margin: 0 auto;

        }

            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary) 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);

            overflow: hidden;

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="fr">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>CV {{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }}</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: {{ data.textColor|default('#000000') }};

        {% if data.selectedBackgroundType is defined and data.selectedBackgroundType == 'svg' %}
            background-image: url('/images/backgrounds/{{ data.selectedBackground }}');
            background-size: cover;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
        {% elseif data.selectedBackground is defined and data.selectedBackground != 'none' %}
            background-image: url('/images/backgrounds/{{ data.selectedBackground }}');
            background-repeat: repeat;
        {% else %}
            background-color: {{ data.selectedBackgroundColor|default('#ffffff') }};
        {% endif %}

            padding: 2cm;
            margin: 0;
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4 {
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-top: 0;
            color: {{ data.textColor|default('#000000') }};
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            margin-bottom: 0.2em;
        }

        h2 {
            font-size: 1.4em;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
            padding-bottom: 5px;
            margin-top: 20px;
        }

        hr {
            border: 0;
            border-top: 1px solid #ddd;
            margin: 15px 0;
        }

        .header-container {
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .profile-image {
            width: 120px;
            height: 120px;
            border-radius: 5px;
            object-fit: cover;
            margin-right: 20px;
        }

        .header-text {
            flex-grow: 1;
        }

            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

            margin: 5px 0;
        }

            font-size: 1.2em;
            font-weight: 400;
            color: #555;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }

        .section {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .experience-item, .education-item {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .item-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .item-title {
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .item-date {
            color: #666;
        }

        .item-subtitle {
            font-style: italic;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

            margin-top: 5px;
        }

            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-top: 10px;
        }

        .skill-item, .language-item {
            background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
            padding: 3px 10px;
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        @media print {
            body {
                padding: 0;
            }

            .page-break {
                page-break-before: always;
            }
        }
    </style>

Fichier: Templates\cv_generator\cv_template_elegant.html.twig
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\Templates\cv_generator\cv_template_elegant.html.twig
-----
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="fr">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>CV - {{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }}</title>
    <style>
        @page {
            margin: 0;
            size: A4 portrait;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Helvetica', 'Arial', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: #333;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: #fff;
            font-size: 11pt;
        }

        .container {
            position: relative;
        }

        /* Header Section */
        .header {
            background-color: #ff3a3a;
            color: white;
            padding: 30px 40px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .profile-info {
            flex: 2;
        }

        .profile-img-container {
            flex: 1;
            text-align: right;
            margin-left: 20px;
        }

        .profile-img {
            width: 120px;
            height: 120px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 3px solid white;
            object-fit: cover;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        }

        h1 {
            margin: 0;
            font-size: 24pt;
            font-weight: bold;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }

        h2 {
            margin: 5px 0 15px;
            font-size: 14pt;
            font-weight: normal;
            opacity: 0.9;
        }

        /* Main Content */
        .main-content {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        /* Left Column */
        .left-column {
            flex: 1;
            padding-right: 20px;
            min-width: 200px;
        }

        /* Right Column */
        .right-column {
            flex: 2;
            padding-left: 20px;
            border-left: 1px solid #eee;
        }

        /* Contact Information */
        .contact-info {
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }

        .contact-info p {
            margin: 5px 0;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .icon {
            margin-right: 10px;
            width: 16px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #ff3a3a;
        }

        .section {
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }

            font-size: 14pt;
            margin-bottom: 10px;

            padding-bottom: 5px;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        /* Experience & Education */

            margin-bottom: 15px;
            position: relative;
        }

            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

            margin: 0;
        }

        }

        }

            text-align: justify;
        }

        }

            background-color: #f0f0f0;

        }

            margin: 0;

        }

        }

        .language-level {
            color: #777;
        }

            font-style: italic;

        }

        }

            --white: #ffffff;
        }

        }

{% extends 'base.html.twig' %}

{% block title %}CV Generator | ESPRIT{% endblock %}

{% block stylesheets %}
    {{ parent() }}
    <!-- Modern Libraries -->
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/cropperjs/1.5.12/cropper.min.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ asset('css/main-cv-generator.css') }}">

{% block body %}
    <!-- Header with Progress Bar -->
    <header class="cv-generator-header">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="header-content">
                <a href="{{ path('app_welcome') }}" class="header-logo">
                    <img src="{{ asset('images/esprim.png') }}" alt="ESPRIT" class="logo-img">
                    <span class="logo-text">CV Generator</span>
                </a>
                <div class="header-progress">
                    <div class="progress-text">Progression: <span id="progress-percent">25</span>%</div>
                    <div class="progress">
                        <div class="progress-bar" role="progressbar" style="width: 25%" aria-valuenow="25" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100"></div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="header-actions">
                    <button id="previewToggleBtn" class="btn btn-outline-primary" title="Pr√©visualiser votre CV">
                        <i class="fas fa-eye"></i> Pr√©visualiser
                    </button>
                    <button id="saveProgressBtn" class="btn btn-outline-secondary" title="Sauvegarder votre progression">
                        <i class="fas fa-save"></i> Sauvegarder
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </header>

    <!-- Main Content -->
    <main class="main-content">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="row">
                <!-- CV Form Section -->
                <div class="col-lg-8">
                    <div class="main-title-container">
                        <h1 class="main-title">
                            <span class="title-accent">ESPRIT</span> CV Generator
                            <i class="fas fa-file-alt title-icon"></i>
                        </h1>
                        <p class="main-subtitle">Cr√©ez votre CV professionnel en quelques minutes</p>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Modern Stepper instead of Progress Tracking -->
                    <div id="cv-stepper-container" class="mb-4"></div>

                    <!-- Selected Template Banner -->
                    <div class="selected-template-banner" id="selectedTemplateBanner">
                        <div class="template-info">
                            <div class="template-thumbnail">
                                <img src="{{ asset('images/cvs/executive.jpg') }}" id="selectedTemplateImage" alt="Template s√©lectionn√©" class="template-thumb-img">
                            </div>
                            <div class="template-details">
                                <h4>Template: <span id="selectedTemplateName">ESPRIT Original</span></h4>
                                <p>Parfait pour les profils techniques et d'ing√©nierie</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="template-actions">
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary" id="changeTemplateBtn">
                                <i class="fas fa-exchange-alt"></i> Changer
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- CV Form -->
                    <div class="card shadow cv-form-card">
                        <div class="card-header d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                            <h3 class="card-title mb-0"><i class="fas fa-file-alt me-2"></i>Cr√©ez votre CV professionnel</h3>
                            <div class="card-actions">

{% block javascripts %}
    {{ parent() }}
    <script src="https://polyfill.io/v3/polyfill.min.js?features=es6"></script>
    <script id="MathJax-script" async src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/mathjax@3/es5/tex-mml-chtml.js"></script>
    <!-- Ajout d'un highlight de syntaxe pour mieux visualiser le code LaTeX -->
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/11.7.0/highlight.min.js"></script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/11.7.0/styles/github.min.css">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const openButton = document.getElementById('open-latex-button');
            const preview = document.getElementById('latex-preview');
            const formulaList = document.getElementById('formula-list');
            const noFormulasMessage = document.getElementById('no-formulas-message');
            const clearButton = document.getElementById('clear-formulas');

            // Initialiser highlight.js pour la coloration syntaxique du code
            document.querySelectorAll('pre code').forEach((block) => {
                hljs.highlightBlock(block);
            });

            // Charger les formules existantes depuis localStorage
            const loadFormulas = () => {
                const storedFormulas = localStorage.getItem('latex_formulas');
                const formulas = storedFormulas ? JSON.parse(storedFormulas) : [];

                if (formulas.length > 0) {
                    noFormulasMessage.style.display = 'none';
                    formulaList.innerHTML = '';

                    formulas.forEach((formula, index) => {
                        const formulaItem = document.createElement('div');
                        formulaItem.className = 'formula-item';

                        const formulaContent = document.createElement('div');
                        formulaContent.innerHTML = '$$' + formula + '$$';

                        const formulaActions = document.createElement('div');
                        formulaActions.className = 'mt-2 d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center';

                        const formulaText = document.createElement('code');
                        formulaText.className = 'me-2';
                        formulaText.textContent = formula;
                        formulaText.style.fontSize = '0.8rem';
                        formulaText.style.color = '#666';

                        const buttonGroup = document.createElement('div');

                        const deleteButton = document.createElement('button');
                        deleteButton.className = 'btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger ms-2';
                        deleteButton.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-trash"></i> Supprimer';
                        deleteButton.onclick = () => removeFormula(index);

                        formulaActions.appendChild(formulaText);
                        buttonGroup.appendChild(deleteButton);
                        formulaActions.appendChild(buttonGroup);
                        formulaItem.appendChild(formulaContent);
                        formulaItem.appendChild(formulaActions);
                        formulaList.appendChild(formulaItem);
                    });

                    // Rendre les formules avec MathJax
                    if (window.MathJax) {
                        MathJax.typesetPromise([formulaList]);
                    }
                } else {
                    noFormulasMessage.style.display = 'block';
                    formulaList.innerHTML = '';
                    formulaList.appendChild(noFormulasMessage);
                }
            };

            // Supprimer une formule
            const removeFormula = (index) => {
                const storedFormulas = localStorage.getItem('latex_formulas');
                const formulas = storedFormulas ? JSON.parse(storedFormulas) : [];

                formulas.splice(index, 1);
                localStorage.setItem('latex_formulas', JSON.stringify(formulas));
                loadFormulas();
            };

            // Ouvrir l'√©diteur LaTeX
            openButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
                window.open('/latex', 'LaTeXEditor', 'width=800,height=600');
            });

            // R√©cup√©rer la formule LaTeX depuis localStorage
            window.addEventListener('storage', function(e) {
                if (e.key === 'latex_formula') {
                    const formula = localStorage.getItem('latex_formula');
                    if (formula) {
                        // Afficher dans la pr√©visualisation
                        preview.innerHTML = '$$' + formula + '$$';

                        // Stocker dans la liste des formules
                        const storedFormulas = localStorage.getItem('latex_formulas');
                        const formulas = storedFormulas ? JSON.parse(storedFormulas) : [];
                        formulas.push(formula);
                        localStorage.setItem('latex_formulas', JSON.stringify(formulas));

                        // Rendre avec MathJax
                        if (window.MathJax) {
                            MathJax.typesetPromise([preview]);
                        }

                        // Supprimer la formule temporaire
                        localStorage.removeItem('latex_formula');

                        // Recharger la liste des formules
                        loadFormulas();
                    }
                }
            });

            // √âcouter les √©v√©nements de message
            window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
                if (event.data && event.data.type === 'latex_insert') {
                    const formula = event.data.latex;

                    // Afficher dans la pr√©visualisation
                    preview.innerHTML = '$$' + formula + '$$';

                    // Stocker dans la liste des formules
                    const storedFormulas = localStorage.getItem('latex_formulas');
                    const formulas = storedFormulas ? JSON.parse(storedFormulas) : [];
                    formulas.push(formula);
                    localStorage.setItem('latex_formulas', JSON.stringify(formulas));

                    // Rendre avec MathJax
                    if (window.MathJax) {
                        MathJax.typesetPromise([preview]);
                    }

                    // Recharger la liste des formules
                    loadFormulas();
                }
            });

            // Effacer toutes les formules
            clearButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (confirm('√ätes-vous s√ªr de vouloir supprimer toutes les formules?')) {
                    localStorage.removeItem('latex_formulas');
                    preview.innerHTML = 'Aucune formule LaTeX ins√©r√©e pour l\'instant.';
                    loadFormulas();
                }
            });

            // Charger les formules existantes au chargement de la page
            loadFormulas();
        });
    </script>
{% endblock %}
