<?php
// src/Service/LatexService.php
// Last updated: 2025-05-13 19:01:15
// Author: Mohamed-abidi-95

namespace App\Service;

use Symfony\Component\Process\Process;
use Symfony\Component\Process\Exception\ProcessFailedException;
use Psr\Log\LoggerInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Filesystem\Filesystem;

class LatexService
{
    private string $projectDir;
    private LoggerInterface $logger;
    private Filesystem $filesystem;
    private ?string $customPdfLatexPath = null;
    private string $engine = 'pdflatex';
    private int $timeout = 60;
    private bool $cleanup = true;

    public function __construct(string $projectDir, LoggerInterface $logger)
    {
        $this->projectDir = $projectDir;
        $this->logger = $logger;
        $this->filesystem = new Filesystem();

        // Rechercher un chemin personnalis√© pour pdflatex (MikTeX sur Windows)
        $possiblePaths = [
            'C:\Users\Sh-Pc\AppData\Local\Programs\MiKTeX\miktex\bin\x64\pdflatex.exe',
            'C:\Program Files\MiKTeX\miktex\bin\x64\pdflatex.exe'
        ];

        foreach ($possiblePaths as $path) {
            if (file_exists($path)) {
                $this->customPdfLatexPath = $path;
                $this->logger->info("Chemin pdflatex d√©tect√©: $path");
                break;
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * D√©finit un chemin personnalis√© pour pdflatex
     */
    public function setCustomPdfLatexPath(?string $path): void
    {
        if ($path && file_exists($path)) {
            $this->customPdfLatexPath = $path;
            $this->logger->info('Chemin personnalis√© pdflatex d√©fini: ' . $path);
        } else {
            $this->logger->warning('Chemin personnalis√© pdflatex invalide ou non disponible: ' . ($path ?? 'null'));
        }
    }

    /**
     * D√©finit le moteur LaTeX √† utiliser
     */
    public function setLatexEngine(string $engine): void
    {
        $this->engine = $engine;
        $this->logger->info('Moteur LaTeX d√©fini: ' . $engine);
    }

    /**
     * D√©finit le timeout pour la compilation LaTeX
     */
    public function setTimeout(int $timeout): void
    {
        $this->timeout = $timeout;
    }

    /**
     * D√©finit si les fichiers temporaires doivent √™tre nettoy√©s
     */
    public function setCleanup(bool $cleanup): void
    {
        $this->cleanup = $cleanup;
    }

    /**
     * G√©n√®re un PDF √† partir de code LaTeX
     *
     * @param string $latexCode Code LaTeX √† convertir
     * @param string $outputDir R√©pertoire de sortie pour le PDF g√©n√©r√©
     * @param array $options Options suppl√©mentaires
     * @return array R√©sultat de la conversion
     */
    public function generatePdf(string $latexCode, string $outputDir, array $options = []): array
    {
        $this->logger->info('D√©but de la g√©n√©ration du PDF');

        // Options par d√©faut
        $defaultOptions = [
            'cleanup' => $this->cleanup,  // Nettoyer les fichiers temporaires
            'timeout' => $this->timeout,  // Timeout en secondes
            'engine' => $this->engine,    // Moteur LaTeX √† utiliser
            'extra_args' => []           // Arguments suppl√©mentaires pour pdflatex
        ];

        $options = array_merge($defaultOptions, $options);

        // Cr√©er le r√©pertoire de sortie s'il n'existe pas
        if (!$this->filesystem->exists($outputDir)) {
            $this->logger->info('Cr√©ation du r√©pertoire de sortie: ' . $outputDir);
            $this->filesystem->mkdir($outputDir, 0777);
        }

        // Cr√©er un fichier temporaire avec un ID unique
        $uniqueId = uniqid('latex_');
        $tempFilename = $uniqueId . '.tex';
        $tempFilePath = $outputDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $tempFilename;

        try {
            // √âcrire le code LaTeX dans le fichier temporaire
            $this->filesystem->dumpFile($tempFilePath, $latexCode);
            $this->logger->info('Fichier LaTeX temporaire cr√©√©: ' . $tempFilePath);

            // D√©terminer la commande √† utiliser (custom path ou PATH)
            $latexCommand = $this->customPdfLatexPath ?: $options['engine'];
            $this->logger->info('Utilisation de la commande: ' . $latexCommand);

            // Construire les arguments de base
            $processArgs = [
                $latexCommand,
                '-interaction=nonstopmode',
                '-output-directory=' . $outputDir
            ];

            // Ajouter des arguments suppl√©mentaires si sp√©cifi√©s
            if (!empty($options['extra_args']) && is_array($options['extra_args'])) {
                $processArgs = array_merge($processArgs, $options['extra_args']);
            }

            // Ajouter le fichier source en dernier
            $processArgs[] = $tempFilePath;

            // Lancer le processus
            $process = new Process($processArgs);
            $process->setTimeout($options['timeout']);
            $process->setIdleTimeout($options['timeout'] / 2);

            // Log la commande compl√®te pour le d√©bogage
            $this->logger->info('Ex√©cution de la commande: ' . implode(' ', $processArgs));

            // Ex√©cuter deux fois pour les r√©f√©rences crois√©es, tableaux, etc.
            $process->run();
            $firstRunOutput = $process->getOutput();
            $firstRunSuccess = $process->isSuccessful();

            // Si la premi√®re ex√©cution a r√©ussi, ex√©cuter une seconde fois
            if ($firstRunSuccess) {
                $process->run();
            }

            // Chemin du PDF g√©n√©r√©
            $pdfFilename = $uniqueId . '.pdf';
            $pdfPath = $outputDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $pdfFilename;

            // V√©rifier si le processus a r√©ussi et si le PDF existe
            if (!$process->isSuccessful() || !$this->filesystem->exists($pdfPath)) {
                $this->logger->error('√âchec de la g√©n√©ration du PDF');
                $errorMessage = $this->parseLatexError($process->getOutput());

                // Log les d√©tails complets pour le d√©bogage
                $this->logger->error('Sortie compl√®te: ' . $process->getOutput());
                $this->logger->error('Erreur: ' . $process->getErrorOutput());

                return [
                    'success' => false,
                    'error' => $errorMessage,
                    'output' => $process->getOutput(),
                    'error_output' => $process->getErrorOutput(),
                    'exit_code' => $process->getExitCode()
                ];
            }

            $this->logger->info('PDF g√©n√©r√© avec succ√®s: ' . $pdfPath);

            // Nettoyer les fichiers temporaires si demand√©
            if ($options['cleanup']) {
                $this->cleanupTempFiles($outputDir, $uniqueId);
            }

            return [
                'success' => true,
                'pdf_path' => $pdfPath,
                'filename' => $pdfFilename,
                'output' => $process->getOutput(),
                'exit_code' => $process->getExitCode()
            ];
        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            $this->logger->error('Exception lors de la g√©n√©ration du PDF: ' . $e->getMessage());
            $this->logger->error('Stack trace: ' . $e->getTraceAsString());

            return [
                'success' => false,
                'error' => 'Erreur syst√®me: ' . $e->getMessage(),
                'output' => $e->getTraceAsString()
            ];
        }
    }

    /**
     * Nettoie les fichiers temporaires g√©n√©r√©s par LaTeX
     *
     * @param string $directory R√©pertoire contenant les fichiers
     * @param string $filePrefix Pr√©fixe des fichiers √† nettoyer
     */
    private function cleanupTempFiles(string $directory, string $filePrefix): void
    {
        // Extensions des fichiers temporaires g√©n√©r√©s par LaTeX
        $extensions = ['aux', 'log', 'out', 'toc', 'lof', 'lot', 'bbl', 'blg', 'idx', 'ilg', 'ind', 'tex'];

        $this->logger->info('Nettoyage des fichiers temporaires pour: ' . $filePrefix);

        foreach ($extensions as $ext) {
            $file = $directory . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $filePrefix . '.' . $ext;
            if ($this->filesystem->exists($file)) {
                try {
                    $this->filesystem->remove($file);
                } catch (\Exception $e) {
                    $this->logger->warning('Impossible de supprimer le fichier ' . $file . ': ' . $e->getMessage());
                }
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * Analyse la sortie LaTeX pour extraire des messages d'erreur plus compr√©hensibles
     *
     * @param string $output Sortie brute de pdflatex
     * @return string Message d'erreur format√©
     */
    private function parseLatexError(string $output): string
    {
        // Rechercher les erreurs courantes dans la sortie
        if (preg_match('/!(.*?)at line (\d+)/', $output, $matches)) {
            return trim($matches[1]) . ' (ligne ' . $matches[2] . ')';
        }

        if (strpos($output, '! LaTeX Error:') !== false &&
            preg_match('/! LaTeX Error:(.*?)\.?$/m', $output, $matches)) {
            return 'Erreur LaTeX: ' . trim($matches[1]);
        }

        if (strpos($output, 'No file') !== false &&
            preg_match('/No file ([^\.]+)\.([^\s]+)/', $output, $matches)) {
            return 'Fichier manquant: ' . $matches[1] . '.' . $matches[2];
        }

        if (strpos($output, 'Emergency stop') !== false) {
            return 'Arr√™t d\'urgence - erreur critique dans le document LaTeX';
        }

        if (strpos($output, '!') !== false) {
            $parts = explode('!', $output);
            $lastError = end($parts);
            return 'Erreur LaTeX: ' . substr(trim($lastError), 0, 150) . '...';
        }

        if (strpos($output, 'not found') !== false &&
            preg_match('/(.*?) not found/', $output, $matches)) {
            return 'Ressource non trouv√©e: ' . trim($matches[1]);
        }

        // Si aucune erreur sp√©cifique n'est identifi√©e
        return 'Erreur inconnue - v√©rifiez votre code LaTeX et les packages utilis√©s';
    }

    /**
     * Ex√©cute des diagnostics pour v√©rifier la configuration LaTeX
     *
     * @return array R√©sultats des diagnostics
     */
    public function runDiagnostics(): array
    {
        $this->logger->info('Ex√©cution des diagnostics LaTeX');

        $results = [
            'pdflatex' => [
                'available' => false,
                'version' => 'Non install√©',
                'details' => null,
                'path' => null,
                'engines' => []
            ],
            'system' => [
                'os' => PHP_OS,
                'php_version' => PHP_VERSION,
                'custom_path' => $this->customPdfLatexPath ?: 'Non d√©fini'
            ],
            'packages' => [
                'basic' => false,
                'extra' => false,
                'math' => false
            ]
        ];

        // V√©rifier si pdflatex est disponible
        try {
            // D'abord essayer avec la commande simple
            $process = new Process(['pdflatex', '--version']);
            $process->run();

            if ($process->isSuccessful()) {
                $versionOutput = $process->getOutput();
                $results['pdflatex']['available'] = true;
                $results['pdflatex']['version'] = $this->extractPdflatexVersion($versionOutput);
                $results['pdflatex']['details'] = $versionOutput;

                // D√©terminer le chemin
                if (PHP_OS_FAMILY === 'Windows') {
                    $whichProcess = new Process(['where', 'pdflatex']);
                } else {
                    $whichProcess = new Process(['which', 'pdflatex']);
                }

                $whichProcess->run();
                if ($whichProcess->isSuccessful()) {
                    $results['pdflatex']['path'] = trim($whichProcess->getOutput());
                }
            }
            // Si pdflatex n'est pas dans le PATH, essayer avec le chemin personnalis√©
            elseif ($this->customPdfLatexPath) {
                $process = new Process([$this->customPdfLatexPath, '--version']);
                $process->run();

                if ($process->isSuccessful()) {
                    $versionOutput = $process->getOutput();
                    $results['pdflatex']['available'] = true;
                    $results['pdflatex']['version'] = $this->extractPdflatexVersion($versionOutput);
                    $results['pdflatex']['details'] = $versionOutput;
                    $results['pdflatex']['path'] = $this->customPdfLatexPath;
                }
            }

            // V√©rifier les autres moteurs LaTeX
            $engines = ['xelatex', 'lualatex', 'latex'];
            foreach ($engines as $engine) {
                $process = new Process([$engine, '--version']);
                $process->run();

                if ($process->isSuccessful()) {
                    $results['pdflatex']['engines'][$engine] = [
                        'available' => true,
                        'version' => $this->extractLatexVersion($process->getOutput(), $engine)
                    ];
                } else {
                    $results['pdflatex']['engines'][$engine] = [
                        'available' => false,
                        'version' => 'Non install√©'
                    ];
                }
            }

            // V√©rifier les packages de base (common packages)
            if ($results['pdflatex']['available']) {
                // Test pour les packages de base
                $basicTestResult = $this->testLatexPackage('article,graphicx,hyperref');
                $results['packages']['basic'] = $basicTestResult['success'];

                // Test pour les packages math√©matiques
                $mathTestResult = $this->testLatexPackage('amsmath,amssymb');
                $results['packages']['math'] = $mathTestResult['success'];

                // Test pour les packages avanc√©s
                $extraTestResult = $this->testLatexPackage('fontspec,tikz,xcolor');
                $results['packages']['extra'] = $extraTestResult['success'];
            }

        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            $this->logger->error('Erreur lors de la v√©rification de pdflatex: ' . $e->getMessage());
            $results['pdflatex']['details'] = 'Erreur: ' . $e->getMessage();
        }

        return $results;
    }

    /**
     * Test si un package LaTeX est install√©
     *
     * @param string $packageName Nom du package √† tester
     * @return array R√©sultat du test
     */
    private function testLatexPackage(string $packageName): array
    {
        $tempDir = sys_get_temp_dir();
        $uniqueId = uniqid('test_');
        $tempFilePath = $tempDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $uniqueId . '.tex';

        // Cr√©er un document minimal qui utilise le package
        $packages = explode(',', $packageName);
        $usepackageLines = '';
        foreach ($packages as $pkg) {
            $usepackageLines .= "\\usepackage{" . trim($pkg) . "}\n";
        }

        $testDocument = "\\documentclass{article}\n$usepackageLines\\begin{document}\nTest\n\\end{document}\n";

        // √âcrire le document dans un fichier temporaire
        file_put_contents($tempFilePath, $testDocument);

        // Ex√©cuter pdflatex pour v√©rifier si le package est disponible
        $command = $this->customPdfLatexPath ?: 'pdflatex';
        $process = new Process([
            $command,
            '-interaction=nonstopmode',
            '-output-directory=' . $tempDir,
            $tempFilePath
        ]);

        $process->run();

        // Supprimer les fichiers temporaires
        $extensions = ['tex', 'aux', 'log', 'pdf'];
        foreach ($extensions as $ext) {
            $file = $tempDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $uniqueId . '.' . $ext;
            if (file_exists($file)) {
                @unlink($file);
            }
        }

        return [
            'success' => $process->isSuccessful(),
            'output' => $process->getOutput(),
            'error' => $process->getErrorOutput(),
            'exit_code' => $process->getExitCode()
        ];
    }

    /**
     * Extrait la version depuis la sortie de pdflatex --version
     *
     * @param string $output Sortie de la commande version
     * @return string Version format√©e
     */
    private function extractPdflatexVersion(string $output): string
    {
        // D√©tection MiKTeX
        if (preg_match('/MiKTeX-pdfTeX\s+(\d+\.\d+)/', $output, $matches)) {
            return 'MiKTeX-pdfTeX ' . $matches[1];
        }

        // D√©tection TeX Live
        if (preg_match('/pdfTeX\s+(\d+\.\d+\.\d+)/', $output, $matches)) {
            return 'pdfTeX ' . $matches[1];
        }

        // Si aucun format connu n'est d√©tect√©, retourner un extrait court
        return substr(trim($output), 0, 50);
    }

    /**
     * Extrait la version des autres moteurs LaTeX
     *
     * @param string $output Sortie de la commande version
     * @param string $engine Nom du moteur (xelatex, lualatex, etc.)
     * @return string Version format√©e
     */
    private function extractLatexVersion(string $output, string $engine): string
    {
        // Diff√©rentes patterns pour diff√©rents moteurs
        $patterns = [
            'xelatex' => '/XeTeX\s+(\d+\.\d+\.\d+)/',
            'lualatex' => '/luahbtex\s+Version\s+(\d+\.\d+\.\d+)/',
            'latex' => '/TeX\s+(\d+\.\d+\.\d+)/'
        ];

        $pattern = $patterns[$engine] ?? '/(\d+\.\d+\.\d+)/';

        if (preg_match($pattern, $output, $matches)) {
            return $engine . ' ' . $matches[1];
        }

        return substr(trim($output), 0, 30);
    }

    /**
     * Convertit un document LaTeX vers PDF et retourne le chemin du fichier
     *
     * @param string $latexCode Code LaTeX complet
     * @param string $documentId Identifiant unique pour le document
     * @param array $options Options suppl√©mentaires pour la conversion
     * @return string|null Chemin du PDF g√©n√©r√© ou null en cas d'√©chec
     */
    public function convertLatexToPdf(string $latexCode, string $documentId, array $options = []): ?string
    {
        $outputDir = $this->getTempOutputDir();
        $this->logger->info('Conversion LaTeX -> PDF pour document ID: ' . $documentId);

        $result = $this->generatePdf($latexCode, $outputDir, $options);

        if (!$result['success']) {
            $this->logger->error('√âchec de conversion PDF: ' . ($result['error'] ?? 'Erreur inconnue'));
            return null;
        }

        return $result['pdf_path'] ?? null;
    }

    /**
     * Obtient le r√©pertoire temporaire de sortie pour les fichiers g√©n√©r√©s
     *
     * @return string Chemin du r√©pertoire
     */
    private function getTempOutputDir(): string
    {
        $outputDir = $this->projectDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . 'var' . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . 'latex' . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . 'output';

        if (!$this->filesystem->exists($outputDir)) {
            $this->filesystem->mkdir($outputDir, 0777);
        }

        return $outputDir;
    }
}

    # Trusted configuration
    trusted_proxies: null

    trusted_hosts: null

        enabled: true

# REMOVED framework_extra section - belongs in config/packages/sensio_framework_extra.yaml if used
# REMOVED templating section - belongs in config/packages/twig.yaml
# REMOVED parameters section - belongs in config/services.yaml

when@test:
    framework:
        test: true
        session:
            storage_factory_id: session.storage.factory.mock_file
        profiler:
            collect: false
        validation:
            not_compromised_password: false

when@dev:
    framework:
        profiler:
            only_exceptions: false

Fichier: config\packages\messenger.yaml
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\config\packages\messenger.yaml
-----
framework:
    messenger:
        failure_transport: failed

        transports:
            # https://symfony.com/doc/current/messenger.html#transport-configuration
            async:
                dsn: '%env(MESSENGER_TRANSPORT_DSN)%'
                options:
                    use_notify: true
                    check_delayed_interval: 60000
                retry_strategy:
                    max_retries: 3
                    multiplier: 2
            failed: 'doctrine://default?queue_name=failed'
            # sync: 'sync://'

        default_bus: messenger.bus.default

        buses:
            messenger.bus.default: []

        routing:
            Symfony\Component\Mailer\Messenger\SendEmailMessage: async
            Symfony\Component\Notifier\Message\ChatMessage: async
            Symfony\Component\Notifier\Message\SmsMessage: async

            # Route your messages to the transports
            # 'App\Message\YourMessage': async

==================================================

Fichier: config\packages\monolog.yaml
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\config\packages\monolog.yaml
-----
monolog:
    channels:
        - deprecation # Deprecations are logged in the dedicated "deprecation" channel when it exists

when@dev:
    monolog:
        handlers:
            main:
                type: stream
                path: "%kernel.logs_dir%/%kernel.environment%.log"
                level: debug
                channels: ["!event"]
            # uncomment to get logging in your browser
            # you may have to allow bigger header sizes in your Web server configuration
            #firephp:
            #    type: firephp
            #    level: info
            #chromephp:
            #    type: chromephp
            #    level: info
            console:
                type: console
                process_psr_3_messages: false
                channels: ["!event", "!doctrine", "!console"]

when@test:
    monolog:
        handlers:
            main:
                type: fingers_crossed
                action_level: error
                handler: nested
                excluded_http_codes: [404, 405]
                channels: ["!event"]
            nested:
                type: stream
                path: "%kernel.logs_dir%/%kernel.environment%.log"
                level: debug

when@prod:
    monolog:
        handlers:
            main:
                type: fingers_crossed
                action_level: error
                handler: nested
                excluded_http_codes: [404, 405]
                buffer_size: 50 # How many messages should be saved? Prevent memory leaks
            nested:
                type: stream
                path: php://stderr
                level: debug
                formatter: monolog.formatter.json
            console:
                type: console
                process_psr_3_messages: false
                channels: ["!event", "!doctrine"]
            deprecation:
                type: stream
                channels: [deprecation]
                path: php://stderr
                formatter: monolog.formatter.json

==================================================

Fichier: config\packages\notifier.yaml
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\config\packages\notifier.yaml
-----
framework:
    notifier:
        chatter_transports:
        texter_transports:
        channel_policy:
            # use chat/slack, chat/telegram, sms/twilio or sms/nexmo
            urgent: ['email']
            high: ['email']
            medium: ['email']
            low: ['email']
        admin_recipients:
            - { email: admin@example.com }

Fichier: config\packages\security.yaml
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\config\packages\security.yaml
-----
security:
    # https://symfony.com/doc/current/security.html#registering-the-user-hashing-passwords
    password_hashers:
        Symfony\Component\Security\Core\User\PasswordAuthenticatedUserInterface: 'auto'
    # https://symfony.com/doc/current/security.html#loading-the-user-the-user-provider
    providers:
        app_user_provider:
            entity:
                class: App\Entity\User
                property: email
    firewalls:
        dev:
            pattern: ^/(_(profiler|wdt)|css|images|js)/
            security: false
        main:
            lazy: true
            provider: app_user_provider
            form_login:
                login_path: app_login
                check_path: app_login_check
                enable_csrf: true
            logout:
                path: app_logout
                target: app_welcome

    # Easy way to control access for large sections of your site
    # Note: Only the *first* access control that matches will be used
    access_control:
    # - { path: ^/admin, roles: ROLE_ADMIN }
    # - { path: ^/profile, roles: ROLE_USER }

when@test:
    security:
        password_hashers:
            # By default, password hashers are resource intensive and take time. This is
            # important to generate secure password hashes. In tests however, secure hashes
            # are not important, waste resources and increase test times. The following
            # reduces the work factor to the lowest possible values.
            Symfony\Component\Security\Core\User\PasswordAuthenticatedUserInterface:
                algorithm: auto
                cost: 4 # Lowest possible value for bcrypt
                time_cost: 3 # Lowest possible value for argon
                memory_cost: 10 # Lowest possible value for argon
==================================================

Fichier: config\packages\webpack_encore.yaml
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\config\packages\webpack_encore.yaml

webpack_encore:
    # The path where Encore is building the assets - i.e. Encore.setOutputPath()
    output_path: '%kernel.project_dir%/public/build'
    # If multiple builds are defined (as shown below), you can disable the default build:
    # output_path: false

    # Set attributes that will be rendered on all script and link tags
    script_attributes:
        defer: true
        # Uncomment (also under link_attributes) if using Turbo Drive
        # https://turbo.hotwired.dev/handbook/drive#reloading-when-assets-change
        # 'data-turbo-track': reload
    # link_attributes:
        # Uncomment if using Turbo Drive
        # 'data-turbo-track': reload

    # If using Encore.enableIntegrityHashes() and need the crossorigin attribute (default: false, or use 'anonymous' or 'use-credentials')
    # crossorigin: 'anonymous'

    # Preload all rendered script and link tags automatically via the HTTP/2 Link header
    # preload: true

    # Throw an exception if the entrypoints.json file is missing or an entry is missing from the data
    # strict_mode: false

    # If you have multiple builds:
    # builds:
        # frontend: '%kernel.project_dir%/public/frontend/build'

        # pass the build name as the 3rd argument to the Twig functions
        # {{ encore_entry_script_tags('entry1', null, 'frontend') }}

framework:
    assets:
        json_manifest_path: '%kernel.project_dir%/public/build/manifest.json'
